Sorry, Maharishi Shukracharya predated Parshurama\nby several thousand of years. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Brihaspati\nwas a god for the entire white Europeans ( Thor/ Zeus ) . </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enmity between two\nrival &nbsp;\u201cPAGAN\u201d &nbsp;clans were deep rooted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why June 21<sup>st</sup>\n?&nbsp; On June 21<sup>st</sup> the sun\nreaches its highest position in the sky as seen from the north pole. The summer\nsolstice occurs during a hemisphere's summer. This is the northern solstice in\nthe northern hemisphere. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Practically the longest\nday is when the latitude of the sun ( declination ) is same as the latitude of\nyour home. The sun then is directly overhead at noon , provided your home is between\nthe tropic of cancer and tropic of capricon. The sun then rises exactly in the\neast and sets exactly in the west.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/dmPXOusmzrw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/dmPXOusmzrw&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/dmPXOusmzrw&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Dec 11,2014, The\n193-member U.N. General Assembly approved by consensus a resolution\nestablishing June 21 as 'International Day of Yoga'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is the only\nexercise which addressed the complete human being\u2014in terms of body mind and\nspirit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is NOT a physical\nexercise alone. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Singer Madonna went\ninto hardcore Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga and the whole western world suddenly took notice\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: It requires a real moron to say that she did Yoga for her FIGURE.</span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-i7ZO-48D82M/VKp5Fd93g4I/AAAAAAAA0S4/_BggzSQHznk/s1600/madonna%2Byhjkoga.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"392\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-i7ZO-48D82M/VKp5Fd93g4I/AAAAAAAA0S4/_BggzSQHznk/s1600/madonna%2Byhjkoga.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes Yoga does wonders\nfor the body . But its effect on mind and spirit is far greater.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No other physical form\nof exercise does so much for the BODY as yoga<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood has a pump called\nheart. The lymph fluid does NOT have a pump. Yoga drives this invisible pump..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The western world of\nmedicine and surgery, has come to know about the human body's lymph node system\nonly 60 years ago.&nbsp; &nbsp;Ayurveda has documented it 6200 years ago . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am from Kerala, the\nland of Ayurveda. We have lost 90% of our ayurvedic herbs because the white\ninvader called our snake groves superstition and they destroyed it. &nbsp;These snake groves with a water body filled\nwith poisonous king cobras held the most amazing medicinal herbs on this\nplanet- unmolested. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This works like magic, as it has\neverything to do with your body's lymph system. &nbsp;No other exercise on this planet addresses the\nlymph node system. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the West , due to\nthe type of hormone injected non vegetarian food they eat, women suffer needlessly\nfrom breast tumours and uterus problems. This category must pay special\nattention to this post .Main stream science and medicine has NOT caught up yet\nwith the Lymphatic system.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/lGRceUoQRVw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/lGRceUoQRVw&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/lGRceUoQRVw&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A good yoga teacher is\nan expert in the lymph system .&nbsp; He can\nhave one look at you, and tell you what is wrong with you. This science is so\nexact.&nbsp; It is a shame to see middle aged\nwomen suffering from excessive bleeding, cramps and PMS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lymphatic system in\nyour body is a series of connected nodes, ducts and organs that play a vital\npart in your immune system. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever Yoga does NOT\naddress, the Ayurvedic massage addresses. This is why a Yoga teacher in Kerala\nwas always an expert in Ayurveda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ULYM4hRQCYo/VKqMixqYtsI/AAAAAAAA0TU/_27GshY8n0g/s1600/images3NGYUU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ULYM4hRQCYo/VKqMixqYtsI/AAAAAAAA0TU/_27GshY8n0g/s1600/images3NGYUU.jpg\" width=\"478\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human arteries are\nlike a two-lane highway bringing nutrients, oxygen and fluid to the body part.\nThe vein is a one-lane highway taking away the used blood, and the lymphatic\nchannels are the other one-lane highway draining away the lymph fluid. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two lanes in together,\nbut two out lanes separate out. &nbsp;Blood is\nresponsible for collecting and distributing oxygen, nutrients and hormones to\nthe entire body where lymph is responsible for collecting and removing waste\nproducts left behind in the tissues. Plasma leaks out of the capillaries to\nsurround and bathe the body tissues. &nbsp;This\nthen drains into the lymph vessels.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: Get your lymphatic\nsystem pumping so that you\u2019re firing on all cylinders.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RA_viSSbhw4/VKxATk6QNII/AAAAAAAA0Z8/Ri3FM2oFBiU/s1600/crukmig_1000img-1206327%2B(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RA_viSSbhw4/VKxATk6QNII/AAAAAAAA0Z8/Ri3FM2oFBiU/s1600/crukmig_1000img-1206327%2B(1).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The circulatory system\nprocesses an average of 20 liters of blood per day.&nbsp; Roughly 17 liters per day of that gets\nreabsorbed directly into the blood vessels. The primary function of the lymph\nsystem is to provide an accessory route for these excess 3 liters per day to\nget returned to the blood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So colourless lymph is\nessentially recycled blood plasma. The biggest lymph vessel is the thoracic duct,\nwhich empties back into the blood circulation.&nbsp;\nAt the cellular level, the lymphatic system is a pathway through which\nfluid flows from the intercellular spaces into the blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lymphatic system\nhas vessels just like our circulatory system, but DOES NOT HAVE A PUMP LIKE THE\nHEART &nbsp;for the circulatory system .&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;In\norder to clear the \u201clymph\u201d (the clear extracellular fluid that is collected by\nthe lymphatic vessels and filtered by the lymph nodes), the lymphatic system\nmust be pumped manually.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5D3_ioG2pz8/VKqNfYP7yHI/AAAAAAAA0To/kEIJvSMeNss/s1600/91f41cbd551556a2c57de4cf092503a00e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5D3_ioG2pz8/VKqNfYP7yHI/AAAAAAAA0To/kEIJvSMeNss/s1600/91f41cbd551556a2c57de4cf092503a00e.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now you get a WEE idea why yoga goes into pretzel\npositions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-c0vd4FPCYKU/VKqM4isHoeI/AAAAAAAA0Tc/6N1BRr6nK3o/s1600/ima9MFes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-c0vd4FPCYKU/VKqM4isHoeI/AAAAAAAA0Tc/6N1BRr6nK3o/s1600/ima9MFes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Below: &nbsp;Look MA-- NO tits ! &nbsp; ( or even fried eggs )</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Madonna will NOT get breast tumors. &nbsp;Yoga experts do NOT even get diseases.</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3dGXR_HgRHo/VKqPKmpV0yI/AAAAAAAA0T0/CLagltmuMgI/s1600/dow8knload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3dGXR_HgRHo/VKqPKmpV0yI/AAAAAAAA0T0/CLagltmuMgI/s1600/dow8knload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lymph is a clear fluid\nthat travels through your body's arteries, circulates through your tissues to\ncleanse them and keep them firm, and then drains away through the separate\nlymphatic system.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8CO6itNq46w/VKxAbn1dmUI/AAAAAAAA0aE/_MrjUBe0zss/s1600/axillary_lymp4h_nodes_tcm8-326824.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8CO6itNq46w/VKxAbn1dmUI/AAAAAAAA0aE/_MrjUBe0zss/s1600/axillary_lymp4h_nodes_tcm8-326824.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lymph nodes are the\nfilters along the lymphatic system.&nbsp;\nTheir job is to filter out and trap bacteria, viruses, cancer cells, and\nother unwanted substances, and to make sure they are safely eliminated from the\nbody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each cell is nourished\nby the nutrients, oxygen and proteins that flow across the walls of capillaries\ninto the interstitial fluid. There is a dynamic balance between the forces that\nhelp those nutrients to first exit the capillaries, and then get reabsorbed\nback into the blood stream.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lymphatic system,\nbecause of its physical proximity to many tissues of the body, is responsible\nfor carrying cancerous cells between the various parts of the body in a process\ncalled metastasis. The intervening lymph nodes can trap the cancer cells. If\nthey are not successful in destroying the cancer cells the nodes may become\nsites of secondary tumors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lymphatic blockages can\nresult in a swelling at the lymphatic node junctions. This condition results in\nproviding a breeding ground for viruses and pathogenic material.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\nlymph system acts as a reservoir of infection, churning out billions of\ninfected immune-system cells that eventually spill into the blood stream, where\nthey travel to other parts of the body.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Up to ten times as much virus may reside in the lymph system as in the\nblood.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lymph vessels run\nthrough the body in much the same way blood vessels do. The capillaries of the\ncirculatory system leak the plasma and nutrients into the tissues of the body\nto feed the individual cells. Most of that fluid is not returned to the\ncirculatory system, but rather stays in between the tissue layers as\ninterstitial fluid. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This fluid is filtered\ninto the lymph vessels and travels back toward the heart where it will be\nreturned to the circulatory system. When the interstitial fluid enters the\nlymphatic system the fluid is called lymph. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lymph nodes lie in\nspecific locations along the lymphatic vessels and perform vital functions for\nthe body's immune system. 6000 years ago, Ayurveda and Yoga&nbsp; realized that many lymph nodes are situated\nnear the region around the joints. &nbsp;&nbsp;Humans\nhave approximately 500-700 lymph nodes distributed throughout the body, with\nclusters found in the underarms, groin, neck, chest, and abdomen. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/ZdYxx4CHb-A/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/ZdYxx4CHb-A&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/ZdYxx4CHb-A&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All lymph vessels lead\nto lymph nodes. Lymph nodes can be as small as the head of a pin, or as big as\nan olive . Half of the lymph nodes in the body, are&nbsp; located in the abdomen, and many are in the\nneck.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The movements of the\nlimbs and positions held during Yoga , help to act as a pump to move the lymph\nthrough the system. They are located in clusters around the knee, groin,\nelbows, shoulders and neck. Lymph nodes are also found in the central abdominal\nand chest area to assist with lymph drainage around the vital organs.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Yoga movement\ntake this into account. This is why Yoga must not be self inflicted.&nbsp; Because the lymph doesn't have a heart to\npump it so good circulation of the lymphatic system depends on getting proper\nstretching exercise and yogic inverted postures which use gravity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human lymph nodes are\nbean-shaped and range in size from a few millimeters to about 1\u20132 cm in their\nnormal state. Fats are evacuated through lymphatic vessels. These vessels are\nlocated in virtually every area of the body where fats may accumulate. The\nfunctioning of the immune system is stimulated through increased lymph flow. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The additional flow\ncarries more antigens to the lymph nodes, thereby increasing antibody/antigen\ncontact. This has been found to help with chronic or subacute inflammatory\nprocesses -- chronic fatigue syndrome, autoimmune disease, bronchitis,\nsinusitis, amygdalitis, tonsillitis, laryngitis, arthritis, acne and eczema.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the lymphatic\nsystem becomes blocked or begins working slowly then it effects all of the\nbody. All of the toxins that your body will normally throw away will then be\nsoaked into other organs and can cause other harmful health conditions,\nincluding obesity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ayurvedic lymphatic\ndrainage massage works with the filtering and cleaning of the lymph nodes,\nstarting at the arms and legs and moving towards the lymph nodes.&nbsp; The lymph nodes are gently stimulated,\nencouraging them to discharge their contents throughout the lymphatic network,\nfacilitating the removal of lymphatic waste from the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IGNORANT western massues ( happy ending party ) and permanently damaged the non-return valves of your lymph nodes. Think back\n--when did you do allow a such a spurious massage on your back torso and\nshoulders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Approximately 70% are\nsuperficial lymphatic capillaries located&nbsp;\njust under, the skin. The remaining 30%, which are known as deep\nlymphatic capillaries, surround most of the body\u2019s organs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE DEEP ONES CAN ONLY\nBE STIMULATED BY YOGA \u2013 NOT EVEN BY MASSAGE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium and potassium\nlive normally within the human cell, and sodium and calcium are found outside.\nDuring the day sodium sneaks into the cell, taking a hydrogen ion with it,\nwhich is acidifying.&nbsp; In order to buffer\nthis acidity, which is toxic to the cell, calcium also moves in.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XxujV_KFv1g/VKqhU1G9HDI/AAAAAAAA0U0/jLqVWe5A118/s1600/main-elec6trolytes-in-body-fluid.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This has the effect of displacing potassium (\nby sodium) and magnesium ( by calcium ) which is pushed out of the cell.&nbsp; At night the opposite takes place and\npotassium and magnesium move back into the cell, pushing out the calcium and\nsodium, which takes the hydrogen ion with it. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin levels\ndecreased in some of the blind patients when they were exposed to light, even\nthough they couldn't see that light. &nbsp;But\nwhen the researchers blindfolded these patients and then turned on the lights,\nmelatonin levels did not drop. &nbsp;&nbsp;Those\nfindings suggest that although their eyes could not sense light in the normal\nway, they still were somehow regulating the release of melatonin, providing\nabsolute evidence that the eyes are involved in functions other than vision. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">improves</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">concentration, builds patience , gets rid of\nobesity and sloth, balances body- mind- spirit, and keeps diseases away .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Ashtanga Yoga stimulates\nthe <span style=\"color: red;\">Vagus nerve</span> and the <span style=\"color: blue;\">Amygdala </span>to cure many disorders conveniently branded as\ngenetic disorders by modern medicine\u2014just because they do NOT have a clue.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">T\nKrishmacharya the guru of Pattabhi Jois, stimulated his Vagus nerve and\nAmygdala to stop his heart beat and control involuntary muscles.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Below : T Krishnamachari.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He cured Lord\nIrwin</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">, the Viceroy of India from severe\nmental ( Bipolar ) and physical ailments ( kidney ) . He was about to go back\nhome, when someone told him about Yoga guru T Krishmamachari. &nbsp;</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grasping at the\nlast straw he summoned this Yogi to his bunglow in Simla and arranged for a\nroom. Within six months Lord Irwin was free of all his ailments (<b> considered as\ngenetic </b>) and he was grateful to this Yogi, who did NOT charge any fees.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
