, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cardiovascular\nsystem is limited in its ability to quickly deliver blood and oxygen to the\nworking muscles. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of this, during\nhigh intensity exercise, ATP is also provided by anaerobic metabolism that\ndon't require an ongoing supply of oxygen. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anaerobic pathways can provide ATP\nimmediately, but they also have limited stores that need to be refilled after\nthey are used up.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I read in the newspapers a\ncouple of day ago that it takes 3 months to heal a broken heart . &nbsp;Increasing the energy of the heart and thymus\nhelps to address the emotional issues associated with a \u2018broken heart.\u2019 &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nour thymus is compromised, we go on a self destructive path . &nbsp;It damages the immune system which can no\nlonger fight off viruses or bacteria . &nbsp;Anything\nthe western doctors do NOT know that claim that it is genetic disorder or that\nthe immune system is attacking the body cells. It is a happy exercise. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No yoga student tries\nto show off like a person in a gym trying toshow off his biceps and six\npack.&nbsp; The results are fromwithin.&nbsp; &nbsp;By\nyoga hormones can be controlled and when hormones are in balance, the body mind\nand spirit is in balance. No other exercise impacts the hormones as yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the west they have done\nstatistical yoga experiments &nbsp;on patients\nwith &nbsp;atrial fibrillation12 (irregular\nheartbeat)\u2014a condition in which the upper chambers of your heart quiver\nchaotically, with huge success . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga increases energy,\nalertness , mental clarity and and focus by improving circulation of oxygen and\nnutrient rich blood . This improves improves your posture which directly\naffects your breathing by increasing our oxygen levels and energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Improved functioning of\nyou immune system, &nbsp;thyroid (metabolism),\n&nbsp;circulatory and respiratory systems will\nresult in fewer sick days, decreased vulnerability to infections and improved\nsleep patterns. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the west , the\ndoctors recommend officially yoga to combat hypertension and high blood\npressure in patients with heart disease. When the endothelium ( lining of the\nblood vessels ) becomes irritated, it becomes a contributing factor to\ncardiovascular disease . Yoga has the ability to reduce stress hormones such as\ncortisol can help ease tension on the lining to decrease risk of heart attack\nor stroke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shirsasana ( head stand\n) uses gravity to drive the blood where it lacked flow. Good blood flow to the\nhead makes you look younger.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My father did shirshana almost till he died .&nbsp; He was a member of RSS before Indian\nIndependence. &nbsp;Yoga was a daily morning\nthing. .. When he died at the age of 78 his glowing face did NOT have a single\nwrinkle . &nbsp;All his teeth were intact. &nbsp;He had a heavy crop of silver hair. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood that concentrates and passes through the\nlocation of the thyroid gland massages and stimulates it. The thyroid secretes\nthyroxin which controls the metabolic rate of the body.&nbsp; Systems of the body are free from\ngravitational pull reversing the effects of aging and rejuvenate the whole\nsystem as all the organs, limbs. &nbsp;Headstand\nimproves your mental clarity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Included in the physiological benefits are the\ndrainage of blood and lymph which are held in reserve in the legs. Any inversion,\nwhen the legs are held over the heart, helps to move stored fluids into the\ncore for oxygenation, filtration and elimination of metabolic /cellular wastes&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shirsasana the \"king of all asanas\"\nbecause of its positive effects on your body, mind and spirit.&nbsp; Freshly oxygenated blood stimulates your\npituitary and pineal glands to calm and revitalize your mind. Sirsasana &nbsp;strengthens your lungs and helps relieve\ncolds, cough, sinusitis, sore throat and asthma.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This upside-down pose aids\ndigestion, especially if you are suffering from constipation. &nbsp;You can lengthen your spine and ease pressure\non your lower back. Sirsasana deepens and calms your breathing because of the\nincreased pressure on your diaphragm. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It causes&nbsp;\nthe breath to slow down, the blood absorbs more oxygen, which benefits\nyour brain and inner organs as it nourishes cells and tissues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-o3941Tbz6lA/VK1Ln9B0ZRI/AAAAAAAA0bQ/waBeeDhDic4/s1600/salamba-sirsasarrna-duo-news1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-o3941Tbz6lA/VK1Ln9B0ZRI/AAAAAAAA0bQ/waBeeDhDic4/s1600/salamba-sirsasarrna-duo-news1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shirsasana brings your\nattention to alignment and balance. &nbsp;By\nrooting firmly in your foundation, the crown of your head, you can lengthen\nyour spine and ease pressure on your lower back. &nbsp;Engage your neck muscles to relax your jaw and\nvocal muscles. &nbsp;As a heating pose, shirsasana\nprepares you for back bends.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Asanas should be\npracticed slowly and held for a certain period of time in order to affect the\nglandular secretions of the endocrine system ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Without yogic intervention, the\nthymus tends to shrink as we age.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3LlSD8YVxXE/VK1YgivrDZI/AAAAAAAA0bg/MqaERJbIL_I/s1600/Thymus-glandrr4_Humanity-Healing.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"246\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3LlSD8YVxXE/VK1YgivrDZI/AAAAAAAA0bg/MqaERJbIL_I/s1600/Thymus-glandrr4_Humanity-Healing.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thymus gland,\nlocated behind your sternum and between your lungs, is only active until\npuberty. After puberty, the thymus starts to slowly shrink and become replaced\nby fat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thymosin is the hormone\nof the thymus, and it stimulates the development of disease-fighting T cells. The\nthymus gland will not function throughout a full lifetime, but it has a big\nresponsibility when it\u2019s active\u2014helping the body protect itself against\nautoimmunity, which occurs when the immune system turns against itself.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, the thymus plays a vital role in the lymphatic system (your body\u2019s\ndefense network) and endocrine system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before birth and\nthroughout childhood, the thymus is instrumental in the production and\nmaturation of T-lymphocytes or T cells, a specific type of white blood cell\nthat protects the body from certain threats, including viruses and infections.\nThe thymus produces and secretes thymosin, a hormone necessary for T cell\ndevelopment and production.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thymus is special\nin that, unlike most organs, it is at its largest in children. Once you reach\npuberty, the thymus starts to slowly shrink and become replaced by fat. By age\n75, the thymus is little more than fatty tissue. Fortunately, the thymus\nproduces all of your T cells by the time you reach puberty.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://ytimg.googleusercontent.com/vi/BMnRHtkVCVY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/BMnRHtkVCVY&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"https://youtube.googleapis.com/v/BMnRHtkVCVY&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thymosin stimulates\nthe development of T cells. Throughout your childhood years, white blood cells\ncalled lymphocytes pass through the thymus, where they are transformed into T\ncells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once T cells have fully\nmatured in the thymus, they migrate to the lymph nodes (groups of immune system\ncells) throughout the body, where they aid the immune system in fighting\ndisease.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though the thymus gland is only active until puberty, its double-duty\nfunction as an endocrine and lymphatic gland plays a significant role in your\nlong-term health.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kurmasana ( tortoise pose ) stimulates the Thymus gland \u2013 just\none of several asanas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pBbLBQ9SNCc/VK1Y7cjPL1I/AAAAAAAA0bo/FH2kjRDQ7SE/s1600/dowe4nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pBbLBQ9SNCc/VK1Y7cjPL1I/AAAAAAAA0bo/FH2kjRDQ7SE/s1600/dowe4nload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga stretches the muscles\nand ligaments . Poses held for a minute can be stressful.&nbsp; But the practitioner remains calm during this\nuncomfortable period. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">It is this\ndeliberate and cheerful calm during discomfort or even pain that create yoga's greatest\nneurobiological benefit. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before, the\nstress response in the nervous system is triggered reflexively by discomfort\nand disorientation. The twisting of your spine, the lactic acid building up in\nyour straining muscles, the uneasy feeling of being upside down, the inability\nto breathe free , are all different forms of discomfort and disorientation. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sh1ME3pF5-A/VK1zx771HII/AAAAAAAA0cA/JbmfdxkgVbg/s1600/im0LDages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sh1ME3pF5-A/VK1zx771HII/AAAAAAAA0cA/JbmfdxkgVbg/s1600/im0LDages.jpg\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this tends to lead reflexively to anxious thinking and activation of the stress response\nin the entire nervous system. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">However,\njust because this response is automatic, does not mean it is necessary. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is,\nin fact, just a habit of the brain. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">One of the main purposes of yoga is to retrain\nthis habit so that your brain stops automatically invoking the stress response.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EZENLbN8e2Y/VK1zn7SiNuI/AAAAAAAA0b4/NVdJXOrjKZs/s1600/ima95ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"264\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EZENLbN8e2Y/VK1zn7SiNuI/AAAAAAAA0b4/NVdJXOrjKZs/s1600/ima95ges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under any real stressful\ncircumstance you can attempt the same calming techniques: breathing deeply and\nslowly, relaxing your facial muscles, clearing your head of anxious thoughts,\nfocusing on the moment.&nbsp; Applying these\ntechniques to real life is what yoga is all about. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga pays attention to the present moment and calms the mind.&nbsp; Over time you will start to retrain your\nautomatic stress reaction, and replace it with one more conducive to overall well-being.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga cuts out emotional\neating. You stomach is bloated like a balloon yet you want to raid the fridge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress causes binge\neating. People eat when frustrated, lonely or bored. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Food not only meets the basic physical need\nbut also social, emotional and psychological needs . Emotional eating is when\nyou eat for reasons other than for hunger. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over time, compulsive\novereating usually leads to obesity. Obesity, in turn, causes numerous medical\ncomplications, including:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Type 2 diabetes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gallbladder disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High cholesterol<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High blood pressure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Heart disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certain types of cancer<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Osteoarthritis<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Joint and muscle pain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gastrointestinal\nproblems<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep apnea<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accumulation of\nvisceral fat correlates with insulin resistance, whereas subcutaneous fat\ndeposition correlates with circulating leptin levels <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leptin tells your body\nit's full and ghrelin stimulates appetite.&nbsp;\nWhen you don't sleep, they get all out of whack\u2014this makes your leptin\nlevels decrease and your ghrelin levels increase.&nbsp; This is why fatsos must have good sleep. The\nfatso eats&nbsp; unconsciously \u2013 he loves to\nraid the fridge even when his stomach is bursting full&nbsp; . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ghrelin and leptin act\non the brain via the hypothalamus . Leptin is secreted primarily in fat cells, as\nwell as the stomach, heart, placenta, and skeletal muscle.&nbsp; Leptin decreases hunger.&nbsp; Leptin tells the hypothalamus that we have\nenough fat in the kitty , so we can eat less or stop eating.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For weight loss \u2014 the\nmore leptin the better. Both insulin and leptin resistance are associated with\nobesity, and impairment of their ability to transfer the information to\nreceptors is the true foundational core of most all chronic degenerative\ndiseases.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diet and exercise are your top allies when it comes to improving\ninsulin/leptin sensitivity, and yoga, &nbsp;can do that just as well as other forms of\nexercise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga can help you kick\nbig-time stress . Yoga gets you to quiet the mind, and it also gives your body\nan outlet to release energy blocks that may have you stressing out even more . Peace\nof mind is a state of mental and emotional calmness, with no worries, fears or\nstress, and yoga helps you to achieve this state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you start\npracticing yoga you\u2019ll be releasing pent up energy that could prevent you from\nfalling asleep, and sleeping soundly once you do get to sleep. &nbsp;Yoga helps relax your nervous system, which is\nthe part of your body responsible for restful sleep or a night of tossing and\nturning. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regular yoga has shown\nto be associated with making better food choices. It creates an awareness of\nthe emotional sensations associated with hunger and eating, which is attributed\nto the mind-body connection gained from practicing yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With its ability to\nlower blood pressure and heart rate as well as improve respiration, yoga\nprovides you with the means to deal with and resolve anxiety and depression\nwithout resorting to expensive medications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga boosts memory and\nimproves concentration. It is the perfect way to clear your mind and calm your\nsenses. You are able to remember things, concentrate, and perceive much better.\n. &nbsp;Yogis have better moods, better anger\ncontrol, and enhanced mindfulness. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga's mental aspect\nbrings a whole new meaning to the phrase \u201cblissing out.\u201d</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga reduces the\neffects of traumatic experiences. Many white soldiers come to India during\nvacations to use spirituality and&nbsp; surgically\nremove negativity inherited from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YQy6jeRhncU/VK2DBww3lFI/AAAAAAAA0dQ/8Uc3XFQfYGw/s1600/yogawaf8rriors-150x150.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YQy6jeRhncU/VK2DBww3lFI/AAAAAAAA0dQ/8Uc3XFQfYGw/s1600/yogawaf8rriors-150x150.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patients\nwho suffer from this mental illness frequently experience nightmares and\nflashbacks, to name a few of the symptoms. They are unable to have proper REM\nsleep. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-juANk8ehN1E/VK2BJBtyVgI/AAAAAAAA0cs/VWVYyL8dlHA/s1600/ptsdsoldi977er1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-juANk8ehN1E/VK2BJBtyVgI/AAAAAAAA0cs/VWVYyL8dlHA/s1600/ptsdsoldi977er1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern medicine has NO effect on\nthe underlying factors of PTSD. Most are immune to the mindless approaches of\nmodern medicine.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When in danger, it\u2019s natural to feel\nafraid. This fear triggers many split-second changes in the body to prepare to\ndefend against the danger or to avoid it.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This \u201cfight-or-flight\u201d response is a\nhealthy reaction meant to protect a person from harm. But in post-traumatic\nstress disorder (PTSD), this reaction is changed or damaged.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogic breathing is\ndiaphragmatic breathing, or deep breathing is breathing that is done by\ncontracting the diaphragm, a muscle located horizontally between the chest\ncavity and stomach cavity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Air enters the lungs\nand the belly expands during this type of breathing. This deep breathing is\nmarked by expansion of the abdomen rather than the chest when breathing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogic breathing is\nrelaxing and prevents symptoms associated with stress, like high blood\npressure, headaches, stomach conditions, depression, anxiety, etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shallow breathing,\nthoracic breathing, or chest breathing is the drawing of breath into the lungs,\nby drawing air into the chest area using the intercostal muscles rather than\nthroughout the lungs via the diaphragm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shallow chest breathing\ncauses health disorders - anxiety disorders, asthma, hyperventilation,\npneumonia, pulmonary edema, and shock. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">TRIPLE SRI patented\nsudarshan kriya causes Nitrogen Narcosis ( Martini effect ) which damages the\nbrain. </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN MY WIFE DID HER\nSUDRAHSNA KRIYA COURSE , WITH TRIPLE SRI\u2014I HAD ASKED HER TO REPORT BACK TO ME\nABOUT CARPOPEDAL SPASMS\u2014 WHICH SHE EXPERIENCED . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SHE HAD TO TUCK HEr BODY EXTREMETIES LIKE\nPALMS AND FEET WITHING HER BODY COCOON TO ALEVIATE THIS CONDITION.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If excess ventilation\ncannot be compensated metabolically, it will lead to a rise in blood pH. &nbsp;This rise in blood pH is known as respiratory\nalkalosis. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When hyperventilation\nleads to respiratory alkalosis, it causes a number of physical symptoms:\ndizziness, tingling in the lips, hands or feet, headache, weakness, fainting\nand seizures. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In extreme cases it can\ncause carpopedal spasms (flapping and contraction of the hands and feet). Your\nbody relies on carbonic acid to regulate the acidity of the entire bloodstream.\nBy hyperventilating you remove far too much CO2 from your blood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The acidity of your\nbloodstream falls as a result. This has all sorts of nasty effects on your body\nif it is sustained, not least of which is an interference with nerve\ntransmissions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocalcemia, which\nresults from hyperventilation, can cause tingling sensations, spasms of the\nmuscles, and even convulsions. &nbsp;&nbsp;Hyperventilating\nDOES store extra oxygen. &nbsp;But you can't\nnecessarily use that extra oxygen, because with low CO2, your blood becomes too\nalkaline. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hemoglobin, in an\nalkaline environment, doesn't want to release the oxygen bound to it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anesthesiologists\nsometimes recommend that their patients hyperventilate prior to putting them\nunder general anesthesia. &nbsp;&nbsp;Bhastrika\nyoga which employs voluntary hyperventilation is NOT Vedic Yoga . This is white\nman\u2019s yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Martini effect\ntheory developed by divers is that every ten meters (33 feet) of depth is the\nequivalent of drinking a martini. At 30 meters (100 feet), the depth at which\nNitrogen Narcosis becomes noticeable the feeling is said to be the equivalent of\nhaving consumed 3 martinis. 40 meters (130 feet) would be 4 martinis, etc. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrogen narcosis is a\nneurological impairment caused by excess dissolved blood nitrogen .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I do NOT want to launch\ninto VO2 max and confuse my readers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 8000 year old yoga\nwe had Vatakrama kapalabhati, where exhalation is active while inhalation is\npassive, the opposite of normal breathing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had Vyutkrama\nkapalabhati where water is drunk through the nose and expelled from the mouth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had Sheetkrama\nkapalabhati, the reverse of Vyutkrama kapalabhati, in which water is taken in\nthrough the mouth and expelled through the nose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOGA DOES NOT SUPPORT\nHYPERVENTILATION !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Example: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cYatha sinho gaja vyadho, bhavedvashya\nshanaiha shanaiha. Thartheva sevitho vayurnyartha hanthi sadhakam\u201d- <b>Sama Veda 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Just like an elephant,\na lion or a tiger can be tamed slowly and gradually, in the same way a\npractitioner should try to tame his breath slowly, slowly or else it kills the\npractitioner himself )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kapal Bhatti shown on\nTV causes hernia and then you are screwed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HYPER VENTILATION\nshortens your life span . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">What the hell is TRIPLE\nSRI doing -- &nbsp;he patented\nhyperventilation and is making money on it. Martini effect ( Nitrogen narcosis\ndestroys your brain) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fake yoga gurus have\ncaused strangulated hernia -- which is a life-threatening condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does TRIPLE SRI know\nyoga? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where did he do his\ntraining ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A hiatal hernia occurs\nwhen the top portion of the stomach pushes through a weakened opening in the\ndiaphragm where the food pipe (esophagus) joins your stomach (called the hiatal\nopening). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inguinal hernia is due\nto weakness of the abdominal muscles which holds the organs in their original\npositions . So the organ gets protruded through inguinal canal and sometimes to\nscrotum. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An incarcerated hernia\nhappens when part of the fat or small intestine from inside the abdomen becomes\nstuck in the groin or scrotum and cannot go back into the abdomen<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aerophagia is a\ncondition where a person ingests too much air, which goes into the abdomen and\nresults in sporadic belching-- this happens when you hyperventilate .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Break Hernia is the\noutcropping of a part of the abdomen into the thoracic (chest) hole due to\ndecline or crack of the diaphragm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yogic breathing is NOT\nhyperventilation like kapalbhatti -- or triple sri ravishankar's SOO HUM -- it\nis deep diaphragmatic breathing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Did his GARGANTUAL\nTONDH not come in between his training ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is his body a Yoga\nteachers body like BKS Iyengar or Ramdev ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can TRIPLE SRI strip\ndown to his waist and show us his yogic body ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;
