text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: ancient Hindus symbol of shiva/ shakti merging has been given to Judaism by the disgraced namboodiris who invented Judaism</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-npD1D-i10HY/VLhkeB7YCwI/AAAAAAAA0p0/WX6gegFRiDg/s1600/U789op.GIF\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"212\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-npD1D-i10HY/VLhkeB7YCwI/AAAAAAAA0p0/WX6gegFRiDg/s1600/U789op.GIF\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: All ancient Shiva/ Shakti temples have this symbol. &nbsp;Judaism is just 3000 years old.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BxNjXvQJAr8/VLhleduVZfI/AAAAAAAA0p8/bcZkI_LDC0M/s1600/image7jbvs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BxNjXvQJAr8/VLhleduVZfI/AAAAAAAA0p8/bcZkI_LDC0M/s1600/image7jbvs.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n###################################<br />\n<br />\nGetting back-<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alternate nostril\nbreathing (as in nadi sodhan pranayama) balances the functioning of the left\nand right brain hemispheres , improves spatial orientation and spatial memory\n(left nostril), improves verbal expression (right nostril) and cognition .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People\nwho do NOT get a single answer in any office meeting ( and hence are treated\nlike sh#t ) and children who are NOT SO BRIGHT in school can gain from this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we lower the frequency\nof the heartbeat&nbsp; we allow our heart to\nrest a little bit longer than usual between two consecutive contractions. &nbsp;This additional resting allows the heart to be\nfilled with larger quantities of blood and to contract with greater strength,\nthereby strengthening the heart muscle and maintaining it in better condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantric text Shiva\nSwarodaya is also called &nbsp;Swara yoga\nwhich implies the &nbsp;\"science of one's\nown breath\" .&nbsp;&nbsp; The script starts\nwith the conversation between Parvati and Shiva, where Shiva starts introducing\nthe scripts and explaining about the need for maintaining secrecy and also\nstating astrological value of the text.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its fundamental\napplication is to realize the breath as being the medium of cosmic life force,\nthrough practising \u201cSwara Yoga\u201d . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/blogger.g?blogID=3564735312144269387\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-utBxgUyV290/VLiP5dMMBSI/AAAAAAAA0qM/fDRZifjoO2Q/s1600/downl56hoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-utBxgUyV290/VLiP5dMMBSI/AAAAAAAA0qM/fDRZifjoO2Q/s1600/downl56hoad.jpg\" width=\"262\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Shakti ( Parvati ) asks Lord Shiva:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Q. 1. Which knowledge\nbestows perfection?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Q. 2. How was the\nuniverse created?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Q.3. How does the\nuniverse change and dissolve?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Q.4. Who determines the\nuniverse?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ELaCOkEummY/VLiR-vxTPDI/AAAAAAAA0qg/QD0TzLye5i0/s1600/thumb549502v437.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"285\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ELaCOkEummY/VLiR-vxTPDI/AAAAAAAA0qg/QD0TzLye5i0/s1600/thumb549502v437.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></span></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Lord Shiva responds: &nbsp; Creation takes place due to tattwas (subtle essences), is sustained by them and\nfinally dissolves into them. Tattwas are the origin of the universe. There is\none birthless, formless supreme existence from which evolves akasha (ether), from\nwhich comes vayu (air). From vayu originates tejas (fire), from tejas apas\n(water) and from apas prithvi (earth). These five elements are spread\nthroughout the world. Creation is formed and sustained from them and again\nmerges back into them as the subtle process of creation continues ceaselessly.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">What is swara? The\nscience of Swara is the secret of all secrets and reveals the essence of all\nbenefits. This science is the crown jewel of all knowledge. It is the subtlest\nof all subtle knowledge. It is easy to understand and based on truth. To the\natheist it is a wonder, to the theist, the base (verse 11, Shiv Swara Udaya)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Who may have the\nknowledge? It should be given to one who is peaceful, pure, well behaved,\ndedicated to the guru, determined in mind, grateful (verse 13) The glory of\nSwara The power of swara overcomes enemies and joins friends, obtains wealth\nand glory (verse 22)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">O Lady of beautiful\nface, all sacred books, moral stories, learning and Upinashads are not beyond\nthe knowledge of swara (verse 25)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">If you have knowledge\nof Swara, it is not necessary to consult the date, stars, days, planets, gods,\nconjunctions of stars or disorders of humours, phlegm, bile, wind, before\nstarting any project (verse 29)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The teaching should not\nbe revealed simply to answer someone's questions, but by one's own self, by\none's own intellect in one's own body (verse 28)<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">AMONG SHASTRA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Among subjects that the\ntexts on Swara discuss are the placement, location and function of the nadis,\nYoga sadhana, description of auspicious/ inauspicious nadis according to the\nday, rules of the five tattwas, Zodiac signs according to the day and night,\nthe appropriate direction of travel, reverse situations, fulfilment of desires-<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Shiva explains auspicious\nacts during the flow of ida nadi, successful acts during the flow of Pingala\nnadi, characteristics of sushumna nadi, eight-fold division of elements or\nbreath, predictions and divination, places of the five elements in the body,\nhow to get gain and prosperity, prediction and indicators of death, attainment\nof psychic powers through the knowledge of swara..<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">This book is divided\ninto 24 chapters in which Parvati, wife of Shiva asks about all aspects of\nlife. She starts with a prayer and obescience to the Lord (Iswara) and then\nasks about all manner of things to which Lord Shiva answers that everything\ndepends on swara; that \"If breath is going out and coming in, there is\nlife and if the movement stops, the body perishes.\" She continues asking\nabout the nature of the universe, the origin of the embryo, the origin of\nswara, and all sorts of details about swara, knowledge of the tattwas, on food,\nsickness, war, dreams and death and many other topics.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Shiva answers Parvati's\nquestions patiently and fully and goes on the tell her all about swara saying\nthat \"for all beings, breath is only the base.\" These include\ntechniques for managing the planetary effects and the moon's phases and\navoiding the negative influence of the planets and astral forces, through\naltering the breath flow or swara in the nostrils, manipulating and controlling\nthe breath or the breath flow through each nostril. We can alter our destiny by&nbsp; being more auspicious, and realising, and\neventually attaining the harmony and the Highest Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pLvIiodQLCI/VLiRcykZY0I/AAAAAAAA0qY/s_F7Il2-TS0/s1600/1451597539hr_86ce594400.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pLvIiodQLCI/VLiRcykZY0I/AAAAAAAA0qY/s_F7Il2-TS0/s1600/1451597539hr_86ce594400.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are three modes\nof breathing- flow from left nostril, flow from right nostril and flow from\nboth the nostrils. The last mode is generally for a short duration when\nbreathing switches from left to right and vice versa. &nbsp;Mode of breathing can be checked by examining\nair flow while exhaling. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All our actions can be\nclassified into three main categories; physical, mental and spiritual; which\nare respectively presided by the above three modes of breathing.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing through the\nleft nostril ( ida nadi ) stimulates the right hemisphere of brain, and\nbreathing through the right nostril ( pingala nadi ) stimulates the left\nhemisphere.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing through the\nleft nostril is connected with higher intraocular pressure and breathing\nthrough the right nostril lowers that pressure Intraocular pressure&nbsp; is created by the continual renewal of fluids\nwithin the eye. The intraocular pressure is increased in glaucoma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing through the\nleft nostril stimulates Ida which relates to the moon and the parasympathetic\nnervous system, breathing through the right stimulates Pingala, relating to the\nsun and sympathetic nervous system. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; Ida</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;nadi is associated with the rest and restorative system of the\nbody, whereas the pingala nadi is associated with the fight and flight\nresponse. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As each rises up the back and\nneck and over the head, the nadis meet in the ajna chakra, or \u2018third eye,\u2019 and\nthen drop down into the nose, the ida nadi terminating in the left nostril ( right brain lobe ), and\nthe pingala nadi terminating in the right nostril ( left brain lobe ).</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JZv7vUWKqBo/VLi6YXdgXLI/AAAAAAAA0q4/2CUWSEfmqTI/s1600/left_brain_objective_right_90brain_subjective.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"430\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JZv7vUWKqBo/VLi6YXdgXLI/AAAAAAAA0q4/2CUWSEfmqTI/s1600/left_brain_objective_right_90brain_subjective.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using\nelectroencephalograph monitoring, modern science has recognised the benefits of\nbalancing and harmonising the two brain hemispheres. &nbsp;Dominance of the two\nhemispheres change about every ninety minutes this in turn relates to a\ndominant nostril side for breath to flow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the left brain is dominant the\nright nostril is dominant and vice versa, the dominance of the brain has an\ninfluence on which is the dominant nostril. What\u2019s also been discovered is this\nworks the other way, changing the dominant nostril will affect the dominance of\nthe brain hemisphere so equalising the breath will also balance the brain,\ncreating the harmonious effect we achieve in Nadi Shodana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">T</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">he flow of prana within the sushumna nadi represents the awakening of\nkundalini, but in almost all people prana only flows within the ida and pingala\nnadis, representing the duality of human consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ayurveda has recorded\nthat human health is dependent upon the natural, balanced flow of prana within\nthe pingala and ida nadis. This balance ensures the proper function of the\nautonomic nervous system, and the resultant effects in the body.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Pranayama starts with the left nostril always.\nThe benefits of left nostril breathing are numerous including sharper, clearer\nfocus of the mind, and a deep, full relaxation or sleep.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Yogic tradition, left nostril\nbreathing has been used to break vices and habits, which usually take 21 days </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protein scientists will\nNOT understand the 72000 nadis.&nbsp; &nbsp;Nadi literally means 'flow or current'. &nbsp;In the Nadis are NOT nerves but energy\nrivulets composed of astral matter through which consciousness flows. &nbsp;&nbsp;Like the chakras ( energy transducers ) they\nare not located in the physical body, though nerves of the physical body can be\nconsidered as their corresponding physical manifestations. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prana ( life force energy ) flows through the\nNadis . &nbsp;When the Nadis have become\npurified the aura of the yogi increases as can be detected by a Kirlean\ncamera.&nbsp; The other signs are &nbsp;lightness of the body, brilliancy in\ncomplexion, increase of the gastric fire, leanness of the body, and along with\nthese, the absence of restlessness and ego.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUALITY &nbsp;/ &nbsp;IDA&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;/\nPINGALA<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Guna /&nbsp; Tamasic&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;/ &nbsp;Rajasic<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Breath / &nbsp; Left nostril&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; / &nbsp;Right\nnostril<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Temperature /&nbsp;&nbsp; Cold &nbsp; /&nbsp;&nbsp; Hot<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sex&nbsp; &nbsp;/ &nbsp; Female&nbsp;&nbsp;/ &nbsp;Male<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Quality /&nbsp; &nbsp; Mental &nbsp; /&nbsp; Physical<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Colour&nbsp;&nbsp;/ &nbsp; Blue&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; / &nbsp; Red<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Energy /&nbsp; &nbsp; Negative&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;/ &nbsp; Positive<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nerves / &nbsp; Parasympathetic&nbsp; &nbsp;/ &nbsp; Sympathetic<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Planet / &nbsp; Moon/&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Sun<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you watch your\nbreath you will find that it is usually flowing more in one nostril than the\nother. Again, if the left nostril has a greater flow of air, then ida nadi is\npredominant. When the flow is greater in the right nostril, then pingala is\npredominant. If the flow is equal, then sushumna is ruling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the right nostril\nis flowing, then vital energy is more active, allowing the individual to do\nphysical work, digest food and so on. The mind is extroverted and the body\ngenerates more heat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the left nostril\n(ida) is flowing, mental energy is dominant, the mind is introverted, any kind\nof mental work; thinking concentration, etc., may be undertaken. Ida nadi also\nflows mainly during sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary aim of\nhatha yoga is to bring about a balance of flow between the prana in ida and\npingala, (ha = sun, tha = moon).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To do this the body is purified by the six\ntechniques known as the shatkarmas.&nbsp; As\nper swara yoga, in a day the flow of air through the left nostril should\npredominate for about twelve hours and through the right nostril for the other\ntwelve hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If pingala flows, the\nbody will be restless; if ida flows, the mind will tend to think too much. In\nhuman physiology, the two nadis correspond roughly to the two halves of the\nautonomic nervous system - the sympathetic and parasympathetic.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala\ncoincides with the sympathetic nerves, responsible for the stimulation and\nacceleration of activities concerned with the external environment and the\ndeceleration of the organs which tend to utilize a lot of energy internally.\nThe sympathetic nerves speed up the heart, dilate the blood vessels, increase\nthe respiration rate, and intensify the efficiency of the eyes, ears, etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The parasympathetic\nnerves directly oppose the sympathetic nerves, for they reduce the heartbeat,\nconstrict the blood vessels, and slow the respiration so that the individual\nbecomes introverted. The flow of prana in ida and pingala is completely\ninvoluntary and unconscious until yogic practices control it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Swara yogi realizes\ncosmic consciousness through control and manipulation of breath<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient 7000 year\nold Sanskrit texts mention 72,000 subtle channels through which prana flows,\nthe dominant flow of prana occurs within the ida and pingala nadis, two\nchannels that course upwards on either side of the spine from their origin\nwithin the kanda or \u2018bulb\u2019 in the sacral plexus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ida and pingala nadis\nrelate to the activities of the parasympathetic and sympathetic divisions of\nthe autonomic nervous system, respectively. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surya Bhedana when\nbreathing in through the right nostril and Chandra bhedana when breathing in\nthrough the left nostril. Breathing in takes air down to the lungs which will\nproduce suction in the eustachian tube.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most adults will suffer\nEustachian Tube Dysfunction to some extent during their lives.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blocked ears can be\npainful and can temporarily impair hearing. The most common causes include\ncolds, air travel, sinus infections and impacted earwax. There are exercises\nyou can try to unblock your ears.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ear comprises three\nmain structures: the inner ear, the outer ear and the middle ear. The middle\near contains three tiny bones, known as the stirrup, the anvil and the hammer.\nThese conduct sound from inside the eardrum to the cochlea \u2013 a fluid-filled\ncavity within the inner ear.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is also a small tube connecting the middle\near to the back of the throat. This is the Eustachian tube, which is normally\nclosed but opens briefly when you yawn or swallow. A blocked ear usually occurs\nwhen the air pressure in the middle ear becomes negative due to a malfunctioning\nEustachian tube.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative pressure within the middle ear causes the ear to feel\nblocked and may make sounds seem muffled. This problem is most commonly caused\nby allergies, a head cold, sinus problems or injuries due to atmospheric\npressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To clear eustachian\ntube of bad ear:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Close nostril with\nfinger on side of good ear<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathe in through\nnostril on side of bad ear<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Close nostril with\nfinger on side of bad ear<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathe out through\nnostril on side of good ear<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Repeat, always\nbreathing in on bad ear side and out through good ear side.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Kerala system of\nmartial arts Kalari ( basically deadly sword fighting ), as 5 year old kids we\nwere taught by the gurikkal how to upset the spirit level of the cochlea to\nimmobilise a stronger and heavier opponent. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONCE YOU UPSET THE\nSPIRIT LEVEL OF THE BEST FIGHTER ON THE PLANET YOU CAN DO WHAT YOU WANT TO HIM\nAT WELL , HAVE A CUP OF TEA BETWEEN SESSIONS OF \"TOYING AROUND\" WITH HIM .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kungfu was first&nbsp; taught in China by Bodhi Dharma , a Kalari\nexpert from Kerala. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can read about the\nspirit level in the post below-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/bully-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/bully-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>BELOW: INCENTIVE FOR READING THIS LONG POST ( 50% COMPLETE ) WANNA KNOW THE POWER OF A SPIRAL ? &nbsp;YOU DONT NEED MEGA BOOSTERS.</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qSIXHwvMpnk/VJ-Y14k0ltI/AAAAAAAA0PQ/GI91UsrBqG4/s1600/minm4it-tikka-bridal-jewelry--e1390321054762.jpg\" width=\"382\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nIN ANCIENT INDIA, GIRLS WERE FEMININE . <br />\n<br />\nTHEY COULD BLUSH . <br />\n<br />\nTHE MOST POWERFUL CHARM OF A GIRLs BEAUTY IS HER ABILITY TO BLUSH .<br />\n<br />\nTHEY HAD A NURSERY BETWEEN THEIR LEGS , NOT A PLAY PEN .<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WERE NOT <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>EMPOWERED BRAVE HEARTS</b></span> WHO FLASH THEIR PRIVATE PARTS IN PUBLIC --<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n-- AND HAVE WIDE AND DISEASED BOTTOM ORIFICES BEFORE THEY MARRY -<br />\n<br />\n--AS TOUTED BY THE SLAVE MAIN STREAM MEDIA , OF THE NEW WORLD ORDER .<br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN WOMEN COULD RUN A HAPPY AND PEACEFUL HOME - &nbsp;MUTUAL RESPECT WAS ABUNDANT !<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Below: &nbsp;Is it any wonder that foreigners like King David ( Bath Sheba ) , King Solomon ( son of Bath Sheba and husband of Queen of Sheba ) wanted accomplished female partners from Kerala, &nbsp;India</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; The pool in the painting is too small.</span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ji8BSAEgFF0/VKYqy0VNdNI/AAAAAAAA0RQ/dnibYq_REpg/s1600/baths23he.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"456\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ji8BSAEgFF0/VKYqy0VNdNI/AAAAAAAA0RQ/dnibYq_REpg/s1600/baths23he.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Below: Mary Magdalene who was denigrated as a whore , was in reality a devoted wife to Jesus , whom he married and took with him from Muziris ( Kodungallur -which has the world's second church ) -- a dusky long haired Namboodiri beauty-- who planted a Tulsi plant at the place where Jesus was crucified . PSSST- In reality Jesus never existed.. Jesus was modelled after a Kerala sage named Apollonius of Tyana. Mary Magdalene was Damisa's ( side kick of Apollonius ) wife.&nbsp;</span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D1TGbuVtVVY/VKYrZ29deBI/AAAAAAAA0RY/lpvHoI1lDoM/s1600/jesus-mary-dvmagdalene.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Were the the prospective brides really assessed for such\nkalas?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ReplyDelete<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Replies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">December 28, 2014 at\n10:56 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every girl in ancient\nHindu India, were trained by her parents and by teachers to be proficient in\nthe following 64 kalas ( arts ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>1-Geet vidya \u2013 art of classical\nsinging<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>2-Vadya vidya \u2013 art of\nplaying on classical musical instruments<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>3-Nritya vidya \u2013 art of\nclassical dancing<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>4-Natya vidya \u2013 art of\ntheatricals<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>5-Alekhya vidya \u2013 art\nof painting<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>6-Viseshakacchedya\nvidya \u2013 art of facial makeup / figure upkeep<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>7-Tandula-kusuma-bali-vikara\n\u2013 art of Hindu ritual offerings using rice and flowers<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>8-Pushpastarana \u2013 art\nof decorating with fragrant &nbsp;flowers<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>9-Dasana-vasananga-raga\n\u2013 art of attractive personal grooming , finer things<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>10-Mani-bhumika-karma \u2013\nart of decorative mosaic <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>11-Sayya-racana \u2013 art\nof bedroom arrangements and home science<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>12-Udaka-vadya \u2013 art of\nplaying on scale music with part liquid filled tumblers <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>13-Udaka-ghata \u2013 art of\nfluid mechanics<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>14-Citra-yoga \u2013 art of mixing\ncolors and dyes&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">15</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">-Malya-grathana-vikalpa \u2013 art of floral designs<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>16-Sekharapida-yojana \u2013\nart of attractive head adornments<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>17-Nepathya-yoga \u2013 art\nof fashion dressing<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>18-Karnapatra-bhanga \u2013\nart of jewel decorating the ear<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>19-Sugandha-yukti \u2013 art\nof practical application of aromatics<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>20-Bhushana-yojana \u2013\nart of using jeweled ornaments<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>21-Aindra-jala \u2013 art of\nentertainment by magic<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>22-Kaucumara \u2013 art for\nexuding charm , social grace<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>23-Hasta-laghava \u2013 art\nof manual dexterity<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>24-Citra-sakapupa-bhakshya-vikara-kriya\n\u2013 art of preparing varieties of delicious food<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>25-Panaka-rasa-ragasava-yojana\n\u2013 art of beverage and colourful desserts<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\">The Indian woman is a homemaker who creates a neat and clean home for her husband and children to live in , not for others to gape at and feel jealous . &nbsp; She does NOT feel the need to over analyse anything what her family utters or be hyper sensitive. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">She has the ability to cast a shoe aside that does not fit, while being graceful , mature and poised while doing this. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">She does NOT breach trust nor does she get mired in self pity . &nbsp;In her home there is no emotional drama, hysteria and cynicism . She has been brought up by her own parents in an atmosphere of kindness, generosity, patience, tolerance, humility, fairness \u2013 and she know what she must do . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">She knows how to create an atmosphere of joy, forgiveness, love, respect, friendship, self esteem and lightheartedness in her home. &nbsp;She spends quality time with her husband and children and she does NOT care for kitty parties to go and bitch. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">She lives life within\nher seams.&nbsp; She creates conditions to\nshare laughter within her home. Laughter is the cheapest luxury, it electrifies\nthe nerves and cleanses the system.&nbsp;\nThere is prayer in the home. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">She is content with\nlittle.&nbsp; She knows too much glamour is\nlike too much spices. She does NOT feel the need to impress anybody.&nbsp; A homemaker is a good one if what she wants\nis what she needs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\">When my elder son got engaged I congratulated his fianc\u00e9e.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; I would like all my readers to stop reading and reminisce the love your mother gave you. . ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; text-align: justify;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; text-align: justify;\">I ask Indian bachelors, ensure that you marry a woman who can take care of you and your children. margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZIvjPAIZyJc/VJ_fTqH_GGI/AAAAAAAA0P4/Q8h1gr_NpGM/s1600/11.jpg\" width=\"218\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Grace and peace !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">..</b></span></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "516", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7952138205762655323/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "883674642507663808", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2014-12-26T18:34:00+05:30", "updated": "2014-12-26T18:34:12+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDE5NTk5MDUyNTA5Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/12/flocculation-of-colloids-on-chemical.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/883674642507663808", "title": "FLOCCULATION OF COLLOIDS ON CHEMICAL TANKERS \u2013 CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TzFsJn9MWDw/VJ1a5fK9PpI/AAAAAAAA0OI/dxR-A_XyyUY/s1600/d975ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TzFsJn9MWDw/VJ1a5fK9PpI/AAAAAAAA0OI/dxR-A_XyyUY/s1600/d975ownload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you recirc or\nagitate chemical cargoes you basically do de-flocculation or de-agglomeration\nand de-sedimentation. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is NOT about pulverizing\nsediments from the tank bottom with a cargo jet through a recirc diffuser as\nsimple sailors often think &nbsp;.&nbsp; It is about building up an electric charge that\nwill keep the cargo in suspension.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uhEjwFMsX0k/VJ1bIFNoXfI/AAAAAAAA0OQ/cTHrhjcD22c/s1600/RECIRC%2BDIFFFU43SERS.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uhEjwFMsX0k/VJ1bIFNoXfI/AAAAAAAA0OQ/cTHrhjcD22c/s1600/RECIRC%2BDIFFFU43SERS.JPG\" height=\"640\" width=\"584\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some solid cargoes like\nclay slurry are carried at sea in a liquid form. &nbsp;Certain cargoes like phosphoric acid get\nsedimented .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solid Kaolin clay is\nmade into a slurry and carried at sea to be pumped through pipelines , as it is\ncheaper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the sea passage\nthe solid and water will separate out-causing a sediment at the bottom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is NOT good,&nbsp; as the pump impeller is right at the bottom\nand will get cemented, &nbsp;and at discharge\nport, ship cant pump out cargo and then has to be pumped ashore using a\nportable pump.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So at sea, the same\npump is used to push the cargo back into the tank through small orifices or\ndiffuser nozzles in a &nbsp;tank to tank\nrecirculation procedure .&nbsp;&nbsp; This produces\na static electricity charge which keeps the solids in suspension.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-s50Uptw-t10/VJ1bR62AXeI/AAAAAAAA0OY/soeKNG8H3KM/s1600/downlo864ad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-s50Uptw-t10/VJ1bR62AXeI/AAAAAAAA0OY/soeKNG8H3KM/s1600/downlo864ad.jpg\" height=\"346\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Latex is stabilized by\nprotective colloids that prevent agglomeration.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Latex suspension is stabilized by\nelectric charges. &nbsp;&nbsp;Colloids can be\nprecipitated by adding electrolytes that neutralize the electric charges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">De-emulsification is\ndone by adding polyvalent ions to neutralize electric charges. Physical means\ninclude heating and centrifuging or use of high potential alternating current.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agglomeration is\ncombination of colloids in a liquid to flocs and is achieved by neutralization\nof the electric charges which maintain the stability of the colloidal\nsuspension.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aggregation is the\ntendency of large molecules or colloidal particles to combine in clusters or\nclumps in a solution. This happens by adding an electrolyte to remove the\nelectrical charges . Aggregation by coalescence or coagulation is irreversible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The destruction of\ncolloids called coagulation can be accomplished by heating or by adding an\nelectrolyte. Colloids are much bigger than atoms and therefore can be observed\nthrough an optical microscopes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flocculation is\ncombination of colloids so that they form clumps or tufts. Flocculation can be\nreversed by agitation because the cohesive forces are relatively weak. Alum is\nan inorganic flocculant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A stable colloidal\nsystem is one in which the particles resist flocculation or aggregation and\nexhibits a long shelf-life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This will depend upon\nthe balance of the repulsive and attractive forces that exist between particles\nas they approach one another.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If all the particles have a mutual repulsion\nthen the dispersion will remain stable. However, if the particles have little\nor no repulsive force then some instability mechanism will eventually take\nplace e.g. flocculation, aggregation etc.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In certain\ncircumstances, the particles in a colloidal disperson may adhere to one another\nand form aggregates of successively increasing size that may settle out under\nthe influence of gravity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I3xtdnhVQUQ/VJ1cq5v6A0I/AAAAAAAA0Ow/XQOd_rj4UeM/s1600/imarrgesCABI4UOW.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I3xtdnhVQUQ/VJ1cq5v6A0I/AAAAAAAA0Ow/XQOd_rj4UeM/s1600/imarrgesCABI4UOW.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An initially formed aggregate is called a floc and\nthe process of its formation flocculation. The floc may or may not separate\nout.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the aggregate changes to a much denser\nform, it is said to undergo coagulation. An aggregate usually separates out\neither by sedimentation (if it is more dense than the medium) or by creaming\n(if it less dense than the medium).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term\u2019s flocculation\nand coagulation have often been used interchangeably. &nbsp;Usually coagulation is irreversible whereas\nflocculation can be reversed by the process of deflocculation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wet phosphoric acid\nmust be constantly recirc during the voyage to prevents sediments from\ndepositing.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphoric\nacid (from Richards Bay, Morroco, Tunisia etc&nbsp;\n) require daily recirculation&nbsp;\nthrough diffuser installed on drop line.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certain cargoes have to\nbe recirculated at sea for successful discharge . It may not be a requirement\nof the shippers or charterers. A cemented deepwell pump impeller can cause\ndelays in start of discharge or severe pump damage. &nbsp;Ensure that such cargoes are loaded in tanks\nwhose drops can be fitted with diffuser nozzles.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SP_I1rDzfBo/VJ1aJdVZG4I/AAAAAAAA0OA/8rqSej3dq0w/s1600/VADAKAYIL3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SP_I1rDzfBo/VJ1aJdVZG4I/AAAAAAAA0OA/8rqSej3dq0w/s1600/VADAKAYIL3.jpg\" height=\"176\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">30 YEARS IN COMMAND</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt.
