, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was 4 feet nothing\nin height, you were repulsively ugly with facial hair, thin cruel lips ,over\nsized nose and a figure like a sack of potatoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She had &nbsp;no father and was &nbsp;uneducated .&nbsp;&nbsp;\nShe hated her&nbsp; mother and your\nsister, who packed her off &nbsp;to Ireland to\nbe a nun in return for financial favours from the church.&nbsp; &nbsp;She knew\nno English to communicate with the other Irish and Scottish nuns , who treated her\nwith contempt for her inherent worth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At this stage of her\nlife what were her &nbsp;options? Well if your\nare the world\u2019s number one opportunist, it is a piece of cake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Teresa was a master in\nwheeling and dealing . This impoverished, uneducated, ugly , and not so honest\ngirl secured for herself her own worldwide Empire, in which she played the\nqueen bee \u2013nay-- God. She was the jet setting Saint.&nbsp; During monsoons she would never be in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She secured a Nobel\nprize.&nbsp;&nbsp; She got for herself the highest\ncivilian award of India , the Bharat Ratna . She rubber shoulders with\nPresidents, Queens and the Pope. She was one of the richest women of her time.\nShe got herself canonized.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, she was NO\nprincess or Hollywood beauty who had all the options in the world , had\nhundreds of men dreaming of marrying her, and still made THE absolute\nsacrifice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By a stroke of good\nluck , after one depressing and lonely year at Loretto Abbey Ireland and\nlearning few English words, she was sent to Calcutta, in India , where she\narrived in 1929, at the young age of 19.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The people of Calcutta\nare known to be in awe of the white skin, sentimental and emotionally volatile\n. The white girl extracted maximum leverage of her white skin, and slowly but\nsteadily, she became the planets most admired and talked about female. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At every Miss Universe\npageant, the contestants won the beauty crown by being equally deceptive . They\nall said that their aim in life was to be a Theresa. And the gullible judges\nlapped it up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her steep rise was\naided by the Vatican propaganda machine. See, how kind and loving we Catholics\nunder Pope are!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mother Theresa , had\nbillions stashed away in Swiss banks holding Papal accounts. She loved to take\ndirty money from dictators and con-men. She never used it on the destitute or\neven the poor sisters who took care of the destitutes, slogging and burning the\nmidnight oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She used a small\npercentage to open more than 700 Catholic institutions world wide. Most of them\nwere political, as dictated by the Vatican. For example-- Just before the\nBerlin wall came down she was there leading a congregation of 20000 believers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She brainwashed all her\nnuns into believing that their suffering was chosen by Jesus. She had nuns who\nthus were zombies, forbidden to express themselves, leave alone complain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And they suffered\nindeed. Cleaning up pus , shit and maggots , day after day , is NO easy task.\nIt was living hell for them. And to see a shrewd white ugly woman who did\nnothing , garner all the glory and play to the gallery and cameras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nuns lived in most\nfrugal conditions. They had just 3 sets of clothes, which they kept mending and\nre mending. Mother Teresa never dirtied her hands.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They only time she would\ndirty them was when her beady eyes spotted a camera, whereupon she would\nimmediately pick up a child do Coochie koo soil her hands and lips.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as\nthe cameras went away, she quickly washed her hands and went back to her\ncomfortable quarters, which was never allowed to be photographed. Check out how Kailash Satyarhi poses with kids for photo shoots .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all the burnt\nout nuns who left Teresa , unable to bear the agony were broken and\npsychologically disturbed.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mother Teresa is on\nrecord on video , gloating with a sick grin, telling a terminally ill cancer\npatient, who was suffering and from unbearable pain, that, \"You are\nsuffering like Christ on the cross. So Jesus must be kissing you.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nnuns knew that the man was denied pain killers or a stay at the hospital ,\ndespite her billions, and were at a loss to understand why Jesus should get a\nkick from watching their suffering. This is pure sadism. And, unfortunately for\nthe poor, Mother Teresa was ruthlessly intent on making her God very happy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With millions coming in\nas donations , she could afford to buy antibiotics and pain killers and use\nhospital care, but chose not to. They all knew how much money mother Theresa\nhad, yet she would force them to use one feeding bottle for 10 babies and reuse\nsyringes again and again in the AIDS era. The food was pathetic. Teresa had her\nown food. She would never invest in a cheap washing machine or a heater to heat\nwater.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was all about\ndisplaying and show casing stark human suffering, to earn more moolah. Like how\na leper beggar would keep his wounds open in a crowded market&nbsp; place infested with flies , to get more\nalms-- depsite knowing it is a wrong thing to do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a psychological\ndisease-- a strain of MUNCHAUSEN SYNDROME BY PROXY.&nbsp; Such a syndrome is usual to a woman who is\nsexually repressed, and received zero love in childhood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">M\u00fcnchausen syndrome by\nproxy (MSbP) is when a mother deliberately causes injury or illness to her own\nchild to gain attention, sympathy or other psychological benefit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Teresa was all the time\nplaying the part of the ministering angel, and chose to save the souls of the\nlowest of the low \u2013 the people who were dying. She was not interested in curing\nanyone. She wasn't interested in the living or potentially living, only the dying,\nand she was only interested in the dying for her own selfish pleasure in\ngetting off on playing the ministering angel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was least\ninterested in helping them to get better, only to save their souls. It was\nabout making people die. The only difference between this evil and that of\nMother T is that she never had to take any murderous actions because there was\na steady supply of dying people, in Calcutta.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I call this\nprostituting your soul. This is way beyond being a cultural terrorist on the\nscale of EVIL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even if she got dozens\nof fridges, washing machines , heaters , tons of clothes , and millions of\ndollars as donations \u2014the destitutes and the nuns who served them were\ndeliberately kept in the same shameful state.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was all about the Vatican\nsponsored press going GA GA about the urgent need for donations, and how their\nflag bearerTeresa was doing a wonderful job , despite all odds. Will Teresa\never be allowed to run such a concentration camp in USA or Europe or Japan?\n--when she has billions extracted in the name of these unfortunate people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind-you, in the\nEnglish speaking countries, her poor institutions, had AC and heating, cable\nTV, free Capuccino machines, decent beds ( nobody slept on the floor ) and\nproper medical care. It was only in India she had to keep the FESTERED SORE\nWIDE OPEN.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She used the Indians who respected her white skin so much, and\nlooked up to her. She trampled on their dignity.&nbsp; History, in this internet age, which does NOT\ndepend on Vatican influenced peer reviewed magazines, will judge her harshly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same way, Mother\nTheresa was keeping the fa\u00e7ade of poverty to advance her own bullshit sanctity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">British journalist,\nChristopher Hitchens Teresa's words at a 1981 press conference in which she was\nasked: \"Do you teach the poor to endure their lot?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She replied: \"I\nthink it is very beautiful for the poor to accept their lot, to share it with\nthe passion of Christ. I think the world is being much helped by the suffering\nof the poor people.\"&nbsp; Saint Theresa\nwas not a friend of the poor. She was a FRIEND OF POVERTY. She said that\nsuffering was a gift from God<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She forced her nuns to\nbeg for bread and medicines, with millions of US dollars in her Swiss Banks.\nShe would force Indian Airlines to fly here nuns free.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was all about the\nholy Spirit guiding the holy Mother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In her Nobel acceptance\nspeech , she went on and on on , how she roamed the dark, damp and dangerous\nCalcutta streets to pick up the destitute.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We now have Kailash\nSatyarthi giving bull of how many children he saved. All he did was to KILL the\nULTRA skilled cottage industries of India where skills are passed over from\nfather to son .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Indian economy is NOT reflected in the stock market . India\nwith her huge potential falls outside the envelope of the Adam Smith and Keynes\n&nbsp;economic model.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She gave away the\nambulances , she received as donations. She did NOT pick anybody nor did she\nallow her clan to pick up. Only destitutes brought in by the Calcutta\nCorporation was considered.&nbsp; Some of her\nambulances were used only to transport her nuns to Churches for prayer and to\nAirports and Train stations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blah Blah-- \"We\nhave a home for the dying in Calcutta, where we have picked up more than 36000\npeople only from the streets of Calcutta, and out of that big number more than\n18000 have died a beautiful death. They have just gone home to God.\"&nbsp; WOW!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes while giving\nher speech, she would say, that she fed 10000 people . Then after 3 minutes\nthis figure would come down to 4000, and then jump back to 9000\u2014 yet nobody was\nsarcastic of her true lies.. While actually she would just be feeding 300, and\nonly those who has a food coupon, mostly converted and baptised Christians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She would say \u201d If\nthere was poor leper on the moon, I will be the first to be there!\u201d, and all\ncried WOW, -- egged on by the Vatican sponsored press. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was grateful to the\nVatican , for their fantastic propaganda , and hence in return campaigned relentlessly\nagainst abortion. Her entire obsession was that the raped women if pregnant\nmust not have abortions. She would never fly abroad, unless she stopped over at\nthe Pope\u2019s residence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the April 1996 issue\nof the US magazine Ladies Home Journal, Mother Teresa said that she wanted to\ndie like the poor in her home for the dying destitute in Kalighat. This is a\nwhite lie as she always went abroad for medical treatments .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She also had\nseveral treatments at expensive Calcutta's Woodlands and Belle Vue Clinics,\nwhich are outside the reach of 99% of India's population. Her Calcutta nuns\njust had to suffer out a tooth ache and take a bath in just one bucket of cold\nwater, though she was worth billions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virgin sister Susan\nShields who handled incoming money in NY USA remembers that one year itself,\nshe personally handled donations of more than $50 million in a New York bank\naccount. She had testified that all money came , clearly marked \" for the\ndestitute \", from world wide, and was NOT for opening fresh Catholic\ninstitutions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Computers, typewriters,\nphotocopiers are not allowed. Even when they are donated, they are not allowed\nto be installed. For book-keeping the sisters use school notebooks, in which\nthey write in cramped pencilled figures. Until they are full. Then everything\nis erased and the cheap notebook is used again.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>All ostensibly in order to\nsave. It was basically to fool others into believing she was poor. The real\nreason was to cover up her tracks and avoid getting audited ..This requires a\ncriminal mind of a cultural terrorist .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was compulsory for\nwomen to shave their heads, just because Mother Theresa was bald.&nbsp; She knew very well of the particular cultural\nimportance Indian women (however poor or destitute) attach to long hair.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Occasionally when on\nboard the first class section of an aeroplane, Mother Teresa would demand for\nleft over food to be given her so that she could take them to the poor. This\nwould impress all the rich folks around her and all would say WOW and \u201c way to\ngo! \u201c and clap.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The moment she got of\nthe plane she would dump the unwieldy food into the nearest dustbin. It was all\nabout positive word of mouth publicity. The saint would keep repeating that she\nnever did anything that would detract from the cause of the poor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was an exceptional\nCatholic -- indeed much (if not most) of the resources of her organisation was\nspent on religious activities, such as in the training of nuns, novices,\nBrothers and priests, and in the upkeep of establishments which are exclusively\nnunneries and Brothers' houses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Mother Teresa told\njournalists (as she did very often during her life) how many establishments she\nran around the world, she never made it clear that a large number of these\nhoused Catholic nuns and brothers and were not homes for the poor, for which\ncause money poured in .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 1984, 25000\npeople died in Bhopal from inhaling MDI cyanide toxic gas, leaked by the\nmultinational giant Union Carbide, the Vatican send her to broker for Catholic\nChairman Warren Anderson. Warren Anderson made a huge pay off of Union Carbide\nmoney .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Mother Teresa, whose post-Nobel\nreputation within India was then very high indeed, rushed in to Bhopal like an\ninternational dignitary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She looked at the\ncarnage, nodded gravely three times and said, \"I say, forgive.\" There\nwas a stunned silence in the audience and press. She took in the incredulity,\nnodded again, glared back and repeated, \"I say, forgive\". Then she\nquickly wafted away, like visiting royalty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mother Teresa's\npropaganda machinery handled her Bhopal trip in the following clever but\ndiabolical way:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE-- As she was\npresent to the agony of Calcutta, and that of India's other great cities, so\nMother Teresa was present to the anguish of Bhopal, a city four hundred miles\nto the south of Delhi, when a cloud of smoke enveloped a crowded slum on the\nnight of December 3, 1984.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Missionaries of Charity, who had long been\nworking in Bhopal, escaped being among the victims because the death-bringing\ngas was blown by the wind in a different direction....... Even while the dead\nwere being cremated or buried, Mother Teresa rushed to Bhopal with teams of\nMissionaries of Charity to work with the Sisters already on the scene. \"We\nhave come to love and care for those who most need it in this terrible\ntragedy\", said Mother Teresa, as she went from centre to centre, from\nhospital to hospital visiting afflicted people-- .UNQUOTE</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another of Mother's\nbiographies has a photograph in it with the following caption: \"Helping A\nSurvivor of the Chemical Leak at Bhopal, December 1984\".The photograph\nconcerned shows Mother daintily offering a marigold flower to a woman\nmoribundly lying in a hospital bed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 26 years , dead\nsouls got a pittance of 500 USD as compensation -- This is American \"Agent\nOrange Justice\" for you.&nbsp; ( The\nIndian IPL cricket league is worth&nbsp; 4 billion\nUSD )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When earthquakes\nhappen, she would wait until the new homes were put up by Government money&nbsp; and then her Vatican sponsored press would\ntake her picture against the new homes back drop, though she did NOT contribute\na cent. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world seeing pictures of Mother Teresa bending down humbly to present\nthe papers of houses to villagers, they very naturally thought that Mother\nherself had been instrumental in building those houses, and more moolah poured\nin ( one of the gullible being your truly ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The international\nCatholic media sponsored by Vatican , would splash in newspapers and magazines&nbsp; -- \"All In A Day's Work for Mother\nTeresa\" was how they captioned Mother's photo .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the plague struck\nIndia in 1994, Mother Teresa arrived at the Vatican on one of her frequent\nvisits. As she arrived at Rome airport, she was ceremoniously quarantined\nthere. Pictures of her being taken away for quarantine were circulated all over\nthe world by the Pope propaganda machine&nbsp;\n-- the natural assumption was that she had been working knee deep with\nplague sufferers. She had had no involvement whatsoever either during or after\nthe plague with treatment or prevention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mother Teresa\nfrequently stated that the \"happiest day of my life is when the Holy\nFather came to Calcutta.\"&nbsp; It is\nnoteworthy that Mother's happiest day was not when she got the divine revelation,\nor any other day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 18 November, Mother\nTeresa participated in a dharna (sit-in) and fast in Delhi demanding\nreservations for dalit low caste Christians. Then suddenly criticism of her\nactions started flooding in, especially from the Indian media, who are normally\nsympathetic to her (a lot of resentment exists in India over religion and caste\nreservations).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even her dear old Calcutta Statesman, published a sarcastic\ncartoon, Mother Teresa, who moved quite expertly in response to public and\nmedia opinion in India, now did an utter volte-face. She took the unprecedented\nstep of calling a press conference (on 24 November) at Mother House in Calcutta\nand denied all knowledge of the sit-in!&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She said she thought it was merely a prayer\nsession. Her denial was emphatic: \"I have never participated in any sit-in\ndemonstrations or demanded reservations for dalit Christians.\" A\nprofessional politician could not have lied better, despite being on video\ncamera.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One year after her first\ndeath anniversary, the German magazine Stern, published a searing critique of\nher work in an article titled, \"Mother Teresa, Where Are Your\nMillions?\" An article that took a year's research in three continents and\nconcluded that her organisation did not deserve to be called a charitable\nfoundation, nor she a saint.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On October 18, 2003,\nIndia gave up her most famous mother to the world. She was beatified by Pope\nJohn Paul II in the Vatican in conjunction with his celebrations of 25 years in\nthe papacy. She is now on the fast track to become the first Indian ever to be\ncanonised as a saint despite the pooh-poohs about the validity of her one\nmiracle, and will from now on be known as \"the blessed Mother\nTeresa.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After all did she not operate 700 Catholic Propaganda missions in\n123 countries, under the guise of help for the destitute?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She chose India as her\nbase and got many young docile girls from my home state Kerala for her\nconvents. In USA most nurses are from Kerala, my home state. They will do any\nwork quietly without complaining.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(In Kerala the girls\nare meant to be seen , NOT to be heard, such is the culture. In my wife's joint\nfamily ancestral house with 26 rooms , the womenfolk would not even come to the\nfront drawing room, leave alone talk loud or argue. )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those young girls/women\nchosen by Teresa were not there voluntarily in the psychological sense, they\nwere there because their parents put enormous psychological pressure on them to\nbecome nuns, after receiving financial aid/ bribes from the Church.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several of Mother\nTeresa\u2019s American volunteers in Calcutta described her \u201cHome for the Dying\u201d as\nresembling photos of concentration camps . No chairs, just stretcher beds.\nVirtually no medical care or painkillers beyond aspirin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And all her billions\nlie safely in Vatican Swiss accounts.&nbsp; It\npays to remember, most of this money was donated by the poor common man and\nschool children, of all races and religions world wide .&nbsp; It was to help the poor , NOT for her to open\n700 Catholic monastries and do propaganda for the Pope, that Roman Catholics\nare the kindest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And does anybody know\nthe miracle she performed to get canonised and earn sainthood?-- the least you\ntalk about it the better. Hold your breath-- for curing a Indian woman of\nstomach tumour. How come we Indians, who worshipped her , and the poor nuns who\nslogged for her, never knew about this?&nbsp;\nIt happened just by just wearing a Teresa locket, as per the Pope.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where is my miracle\nlocket? Must buy it!!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Bengali woman\nMonica Besra, never had a cancerous tumour in the first place. The benign\ntubercular tumour she had was fully cured after a full treatment course using\nAllopatic medicines by Dr. Ranjan Mustafi. This woman was forced to give\nbullshit .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beware of all\nphilanthropists , who will donate only when a camera is focused on them. Or\nwill make a donation , only if this deed is made public on TV and print.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Will you make 700\nreligious institutions with your own statue installed with money donated , for\nthe destitute, , by thousands of kind poor people worldwide, who sacrificed\nhalf a loaf of bread?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Will you line your nest\nand become a poster woman , by starting a cult of death-- where people come to\ndie. Where death is pre-meditated, without simple antibiotics or a simple ride\nto hospital in a ambulance--quoting the will of god?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can you live a lie to\nachieve immortality as a saint ? Can this happen outside white skin worshipping\nIndia, in say, France or Japan?.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mother Teresa the\nsaint, is defnitely not playing the harp in heaven. We have a saint in hell,\npaying the price for selling her soul<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DO YOU BELONG TO THIS\nPATHETIC CATEGORY? It went beyond that --for the poor patient was told \" You\npain is Christ kissing you!\" \" Suffering is a gift from God\" .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of these patients\ndied because of malnutrition --just a few vitamins and good food would have\nsaved them--and she had billions stashed away in the banks of Vatican, by using\nCalcutta as an open sore to attract flies --nay- money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were several\nreports of organ harvesting ( kidney ) from brain dead patients and dying\npatients, in the Calcutta Mother Teresa home.&nbsp;\nThese were the \"lucky\" ones who were sent to hospitals.&nbsp; Nobody had the guts to expose this claim , as\nMother Teresa was a international celebrity and considered equivalent to God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vatican perfected the\nart of Inquisition torture in India on Hindus . &nbsp;They applied these tactics on\nJews in Spain/ Italy only later .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let history be re-written . I was the first to\nexpose this on the internet . Today Wikimedia has copied it .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1498 Vasco Da Gama\nlanded up at a beautiful beach ( Kappad ) in my hometown Calicut. Vasco Da Gama\ntried to impress the King of Calicut with glass beads , scarlet hoods and coral\ngreatly amusing the King of Calicut ( my hometown ).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasco Da Gama cooled his\nheels for a few days till the king came back from Guruvayur temple 125 km away\nby elephant ride.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasco Da Gama\u2019s\nsaoldiers started stealing pepper vines at night. &nbsp;&nbsp;When told about this the Zamorin ( king )\nlaughed and said \u201c He can steal my vines and soil , can he steal our weather ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On his second voyage in\n1502 Vasco Da Gama came with 25 ships , thousands of soldiers and large canons.\nEnroute to Calicut they caught a pilgrim ship on passage to Mecca and burnt all\n700 including women and children alive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He pounded Calicut city with his long\nrange guns. When a messenger was sent by the king, Vasco Da Gama cut off his\nlips , and ears-- stitched the ears of a dog in place and sent him back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Zamorin was wary\nof the Portugese and soon they shifted base to Cochin and then to Goa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On May 6th 1542, St\nFrancis Xavier of the Jesuit order of Ignatius Loyola , at the young age of\n36,&nbsp; landed at Goa, after a 13 month\nardous voyage round the Cape of Good Hope-- under orders of King of Portugal\nJoao III and Vatican.&nbsp; He was to harvest\nsouls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon, he found\nout the hard way-- that the local Indians are NOT east to convert from Hinduism\nto Christianity. He started by ordering the temples to be demolished. But then\npeople had idols in their houses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism was deeprooted.&nbsp; The vedic Indian civilisation flourished on\nthe banks of river Saraswati from 9000 BC to 4000 BC. When the river Saraswati\ndried up in 4000 BC , the people had migrated to the Zuari.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1545 Francis Xavier,\nfrustrated -- wrote to Rome ( this letter is preserved ) and to the King \u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE \u201c The Hindus are\nan unholy race. They are liars and cheats to the very backbone. Their idols are\nblack\u2014as black as black can be\u2014 ugly and horrible to look at , smeared with oil\nand smell in a evil manner. \u201c\u2014UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then formally\nordered the Portugese Inquisition for &nbsp;Goa , which ran from 1516 to 1812. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The rest of Europe had terminated the\nInquisition in 1774.&nbsp; &nbsp;It stopped in 1812 due to British\nintervention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">More than 20000 people\nwere brought under trial by this Inquisition.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus were NOT allowed\nto wear the Shendi ( hair tuft ), have a Tulsi plant in front of their house,\nwear the sacred thread , have an idol in their homes , wear sandals , read the\nVedas etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This drove all of them\naway from Goa, leaving the land behind.&nbsp;\nSome of them unwillingly converted into Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was NOT religious\nhatred alone, the main reason was to steal as many ancient Sanskrit and\nMalayalam Vedic texts on Science, Medicine and Mathematics.&nbsp; &nbsp;It is\nfrom Xavier that Europe came to know about medicinal leech vaccination ( among\nother things ) , and later Freemason Edward Jenner made a name for himself.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">The\nancient Maharishis from Kerala,&nbsp;has been vaccinating the Pharaohs of Egypt, 6500 years before Edward\nJenner using leeches - today you can see it in the movie</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> EXODUS -GODS AND KINGS</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> ( in 3D ) where the father of Ramses is getting vaccinated .</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZSj1xZ12oXU/VIpulbRYdEI/AAAAAAAAz3Y/Ot5vI06YDgg/s1600/exodus-gods-av4nd-kings-5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"340\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZSj1xZ12oXU/VIpulbRYdEI/AAAAAAAAz3Y/Ot5vI06YDgg/s1600/exodus-gods-av4nd-kings-5.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The masses were\nconverted into Christianity, saddled with Portuguese surnames , given menial\njobs, made to eat Beef and Pork and drink cheap Feni ( a local brew made of\nCashew and Coconut ). This easy inebriated life destroyed their mindset and\ntill today no Catholic Goan boy has passed the IIT entrance exam. ( ala the Red\nIndians of North America and the Aborigines of Australia ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Jan 31 st 1620, the\nPortugese government ordered that NO Hindu marriages can be performed in Goa.\nThey went one step ahead in 1625\u2014and ordered that NO Hindu infidel can be\nemployed in Goa.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Portuguese\nInquisition Laws filled 230 pages and the Inquisition was to be held behind\nclosed doors. Fr. Diago de Boarda and his advisor Vicar General, Miguel Vaz had\nmade a gruesome 41 point plan for torturing Hindus.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under this plan Viceroy\nAnt\u00f3nio de Noronha issued in 1566, an order applicable to the entire area under\nPortuguese rule. I hereby order that in any area owned by my master, the king,\nnobody should construct a Hindu temple and such temples already constructed\nshould not be repaired without my permission. If this order is transgressed,\nsuch temples shall be, destroyed and the goods in them shall be used to meet\nexpenses of holy deeds, as punishment of such transgression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1567, the campaign\nof destroying temples in Bardez met with success. At the end of it more than\n300 Hindu temples were destroyed. Enacting laws, prohibition was laid from 4\nDecember 1567 on rituals of Hindu marriages, sacred thread wearing and cremation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the persons above\n15 years of age were compelled to listen to Christian preaching, failing which\nthey were punished. In 1583 all Hindu temples at Assolna and Cuncolim were\ndestroyed through army action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Convered Hindus , who\nwere detected to secretly&nbsp; hold their old\nreligion in esteem were burnt at the&nbsp;\nstake or brutally tortured.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brutal methods used\nwere \u2013 To tear off the tongues--&nbsp; To\nblind the victim with sharp sticks or red-hot iron spikes-- The pulling of the\nflesh with pliers-- The skinning of the accused alive-- Quartering (in which\nthe victims intestines would be pulled from the body) and impaling, in which a\nstake would be hammered through the victim\u2019s body avoiding the vital organs,\nresulting in a slow death that could last for hours or days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sharp iron fork was\nused to mangle breasts. Red hot pincers were used to tear off flesh. Red hot\nirons were inserted up vaginas and rectums. A device named the turcas was used\nto tear out fingernails. After the nails were ripped out needles were shoved\nin. Boots called bootikens were used to lacerate flesh and crush bone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thumbscrews were used\nto crush the fingers and toes. Acid was poured on victims and hands were\nimmersed into pots of boiling oil and water. Eyes were gouged out by irons.\nAlcohol was poured on the head of the poor victim and set alight. Water was\npoured down the victims throat with a knotted cloth. The cloth was then jerked\nout tearing up the victims bowels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was no limit to\nthe types and cruelty of the tortures. The inquisition meant anything was\nallowed. The inquisitors were sadistic and mentally disturbed. An\n\"Inquisition\" was supposed to be a legal inquiry by the church.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the poor victims\nconfessed to things they never did more torture was to follow. On the way to\nthe stake or gallows victims were flogged, burned, branded and had their hands\nand tongues hacked off.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fillippo Sassetti , an\nItalian merchant from Florence,&nbsp; has\nchronicled everything. He was the first European to learn Sanskrit. His views\nwere NOT the jaundiced views of a white man. Between 1578 and 1588 he had sent\na huge number of letters to the grand ducal court in Florence \u2013all about the\nPortugese inquisition and the Indian view point.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A French traveller by the name\nof Dr.Charles Delone had got himself imprisoned in the Sultan\u2019s palace\n(1674-77) and saw things for himself . His observations are in his book\npublished in 1687 and is named \"L\u2019inquisition de Goa\".&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kR80GMpVy7U/VIpvD7eLdqI/AAAAAAAAz3g/lAgoqtZ8tqE/s1600/1uui6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kR80GMpVy7U/VIpvD7eLdqI/AAAAAAAAz3g/lAgoqtZ8tqE/s1600/1uui6.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Charles Delone was an eye witness to the\natrocities, cruelty and reign of terror unleashed by priests. He published a\nbook in 1687 describing the lot of helpless victims. While he was in jail, he\nhad heard the cries of tortured people beaten with instruments having sharp\nteeth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr.Claudius\nBuchanan's&nbsp; (above )&nbsp; a Scotsman of the Church of England ,\nwitnessed some gruesome burning scenes in Great Hall of Goan Inquisition in\n1608,&nbsp; and wrote about the Portuguese\nInquisition in 1812. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sTlT_1hyqRY/VIpvLf2r9KI/AAAAAAAAz3o/21Itu2T_Arw/s1600/1hrj3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sTlT_1hyqRY/VIpvLf2r9KI/AAAAAAAAz3o/21Itu2T_Arw/s1600/1hrj3.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Voltaire wrote on the\nPortuguese Inquisition in Goa\u2014 Quote \u201d <i>Goa est malheureusement c\u00e9l\u00e8bre par son\ninquisition , \u00e9galement contraire \u00e0 l'humanit\u00e9 et au commerce. Les moines\nportugais firent accroire que le peuple adorait le diable , et ce sont eux qui\nl'ont servi.</i> (Goa is sadly famous for its inquisition, equally contrary to\nhumanity and commerce. The Portuguese monks made us believe that the people\nworshiped the devil, and it is they who have served him.)\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Historian Alfredo de\nMello described the Portuguese in Goa : Quote\u2014\u201c nefarious, fiendish, lustful,\ncorrupt religious orders which pounced on Goa for the purpose of destroying\npaganism (ie Hinduism) and introducing the true religion of Christ\u201d&nbsp; Unquote.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Traditional musical\ninstruments were banned and only western music was allowed\u2014 a tradition seen\neven today. A Goan Christian marriage MUST have a live band playing pop music . Just an example of long effects of cultural terrorism ..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AClnitw1nWc/VIp1lv6jEXI/AAAAAAAAz4A/NkHmh2iIZDw/s1600/shark-attack-7j92816.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"494\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AClnitw1nWc/VIp1lv6jEXI/AAAAAAAAz4A/NkHmh2iIZDw/s1600/shark-attack-7j92816.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>So much of negativity,\nlet me introduce some good CHEER . &nbsp;See I\nam a Libran .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Two sharks swimming in\nthe ocean come across a group of survivors of a sunken ship.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Follow me son. &nbsp;Today I will show you the correct procedure to\neat humans\" the father shark said to the son shark and they swam to the\ngroup of people floating in the water.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"First we swim\naround them a few times with just the tip of our fins showing.\" And they\ndid.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Well done, son!\nNow we swim around them a few times with full fins showing.\" And they did.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>&nbsp;\u201c Now, every few seconds we pop out of the\nwater, open our mouths and let them see our teeth\u201d And they did.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Now we eat\neverybody.\" And they did.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When they were both\ngorged, the son asked, \"Dad, why do all this? Why not just eat them?\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Says the wise papa\nshark ,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\"Because they\ntaste better when there aint no shit inside them!\"</span></i><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-M4iMOsGh0zM/VIp1SD6zbMI/AAAAAAAAz34/TpSCuF4mDVw/s1600/imheages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
