, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The biggest CUKTRURAL\nGENOCIDE in the past&nbsp; happened in India\nby the name of DEVADASI SYSTEM .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader\ncreated a FOUL and IMMORAL system where their white soldiers can have FREE sex\nwith blushing Indian girls immediately after their first menses . For this they\nfactored in Indian gods to fool the girls. They used their FAKE mutts and FAKE\nshankaracharyas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild gave freedom\nto Syrian Christians of Kerala and Chitpavan Brahmins to publish sponsored news\nitems , regularizing such FAKE and foul temple activities . Both these\ncommunities are of Jewish origin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On paper the Rothschild\ncontrolled historians wrote the British tried hard to eradicate social evils\nlike the non-existant \u201ctemple prostitution\u201d and made dozens of Indian social\nreformer heroes for us to study in our school social studies NCERT books.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today this has boiled down to western\nembassy cocktail dinners where moth eaten faces who come on prime time TV ,\nwould sell their souls to be at. &nbsp;&nbsp;If\nthey denigrate ancient history well enough they might even get R controlled\nforeign awards , all with cash prizes attached \u2013an official bribe for a job\nwell done .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader used\ntheir FAKE mutts and their stooge immigrant Indian media to cement the devadasi\nsystem as an ancient social custom , as late as 100 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They devised a\ntali-tying dedication ( manglasutra ) ceremony, as soon as a girl got her first\nperiods &nbsp;by a temple priest which\ninitiated a young girl into the devadasi profession . &nbsp;Mind you , nothing of this sort is allowed in Hinduism.\nThese girls were chosen for their good looks. This was a fake symbolic\n\"marriage\" of the pubescent girl to the temple's deity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From then\nonward, the devadasi is considered a nitya sumangali-- a woman eternally free\nfrom the adversity of widowhood. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through a R commie &nbsp;historical perspective, Engels analyzes the\nwidespread social phenomena associated with female sexual morality, such as\nfixation on virginity and sexual purity, incrimination and violent punishment\nof women who commit adultery, and demands that women be submissive to their\nhusbands. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ultimately, Engels\ntraces these phenomena to the recent development of exclusive control of\nprivate property by the patriarchs of the rising slaveowner class in the\nancient mode of production, and the attendant desire to ensure that their\ninheritance is passed only to their own offspring: chastity and fidelity are\nrewarded, says Engels, because they guarantee exclusive access to the sexual\nand reproductive faculty of women possessed by men from the property-owning\nclass.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then formally\nordered the Portugese Inquisition fo Goa , which ran from 1516 to 1812. ( NCP ) during\na narcoanalysis filmed by various Indian news channels in September 2006&nbsp; . </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Telgi made the\nrevelations when was in a semi-conscious state, after he was injected with a\ntruth serum at Bangalore. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karim Telgi was\nsubjected to three tests -- lie detector test, &nbsp;P-300 brain mapping and\nnarco-analysis tests. &nbsp;While the first two have evidential value, the\nnarco-analysis test does not have evidential value but is used to support the\nevidence.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Terming the reports as \"irresponsible\nand basless\", Pawar stated that \"there is no need to take any\ncongnizance of what a criminal has said\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhujbal spoke in\nsimilar vein. \"An accused is levelling these charges against me. How can\none rely on what such a person is saying?\"&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Telgi's brain mapping\nconfirms payments to Chhagan Bhujbal</span></span></i><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The Brain Mapping test\nwas performed on Telgi in two stages. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In\nthe first stage, a pre-test interview was done, which was followed by recording\nof a EEG using 32-channel EEG-ECP Neuro Scan Recording system, to invoke\n\"event related potential (ERP) response.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The test was conducted\nusing three types of words.&nbsp; &nbsp;Firstly, \"neutral words\" which have\nno direct relationship with case were presented to Telgi.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">In the second part,\n\"probe words\" directly related to the case were used to elicit\nconcealed information. &nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The report states that:\n\"The major findings reported by the Brain Mapping tests are indicative of\nthe possession of knowledge about the activities (listed above) by Karim Telgi;\nbrain activation during preparation processing while evoking primary encoding indicates\nactive participation of Karim Telgi in all these activities.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The report, a copy of\nwhich was available to PTI, said Telgi was subjected to three tests -- lie\ndetector test, P-300 brain mapping and narco-analysis tests. While the first\ntwo have evidential value, the narco-analysis test does not have evidential\nvalue but is used to support the evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The Brain Mapping test\nwas performed on Telgi in two stages. In the first stage, a pre-test interview\nwas done, which was followed by recording of a EEG using 32-channel EEG-ECP\nNeuro Scan Recording system, to invoke \"event related potential (ERP)\nresponses,\" SIT sources told PTI.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The test was conducted\nusing three types of words. Firstly, \"neutral words\" which have no\ndirect relationship with case were presented to Telgi.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">In the second part,\n\"probe words\" directly related to the case were used to elicit\nconcealed information.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">In the third part,\n\"target words\", which are not in part one and two, but are based on\nconfidential findings which the subject does not know, or polygraph findings or\npossibilities postulated by the investigating officers were used.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">According to FSL\nauthorities, if the subject has truthfully participated in the act suggested by\ntarget words, it would generate ERP, while there would be no ERP when neutral\nwords are presented.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LUzxz4J2ZNE/VILbBki3wZI/AAAAAAAAzkQ/oZJP4YOHWpc/s1600/Pc0070fr600.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LUzxz4J2ZNE/VILbBki3wZI/AAAAAAAAzkQ/oZJP4YOHWpc/s1600/Pc0070fr600.jpg\" width=\"307\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other big names, which\nfound mention in Telgi\u2019s confession were those of Lok Sabha speaker P A Sangma,\nMaharashtra Chief Minister Vilasrao Deshmukh and Sameer Bhujbal, nephew of\nChhagan Bhujbal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The allegations made by\nTelgi were refuted by the politicians. What did people expect , them to own up?\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abdul Karim Telgi's was born in\nextreme poverty . His father a lowly employee ( class 4 ) of Indian Railways and died when\nhe was young. Telgi paid his school fees while studying at Sarvodaya Vidyalaya,\nby selling fruit and vegetables on trains. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he went to Saudi Arabia for doing medial\njobs.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">He returned to India and started counterfeiting stamp paper. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was Ramratan Soni</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">( convicted to 10 years\u2019 RI. ) who introduced\nTelgi to the art of counterfeiting when they shared a prison cell in 1991. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">At that time, Telgi was serving time in a\ncheating case.</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was a bunglow in\na colony of bunglows which used to remain locked always at Nasik . No one lived\nthere. &nbsp;Some folks would come in cars and\ntempo vans at midnight after all has gone to sleep &nbsp;and then leave in the morning. &nbsp;This caused suspicion and consequently a\nnewspaper reporter was tipped off. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This reporter\nbroke into the bunglow when no one was around and found that the &nbsp;bunglow was filled with cases of stamp papers.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;He also took pictures of&nbsp; stacks of stamps and currency. The video &nbsp;showed printing machinery as well..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the television\nchannel broadcast the footage, a police team, led by city police chief P T\nLohar, arrived at the bungalow, named Padma, and seized more than 100 cartons\ncontaining currencies of several countries, including Pakistan, Somalia and\nBrazil, Czechoslovakia and Argentina besides some Indian currency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police summoned\nofficials of the State Bank of India, India Security Press and Currency Note\nPress to identify the currency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vgLhQU_kf8o/VILbH8PCi6I/AAAAAAAAzkY/HsAE1IkOGdI/s1600/telgi-scajkiom-3-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-vgLhQU_kf8o/VILbH8PCi6I/AAAAAAAAzkY/HsAE1IkOGdI/s1600/telgi-scajkiom-3-638.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was later discovered\nthat Mr. Telgi was printing these in his press in Mumbai. &nbsp;He had a printing press business for wedding\ncards, business cards, etc. &nbsp;In the\nnights he used to load up the machines with 'real' stamp paper plates and print\nthem. &nbsp;These were then transported to\nthis Nasik bunglow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">Telgi using printing machines purchased illegally with the help of some conniving officials of the Central Govt.\u2019s Security Printing Press (India Security Press) located in Nasik.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every few years, the press\ndiscards old machinery and buys new. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So\nthey </span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">deliberatel d</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">eclared a few good machines and dye plates as worn and torn and sold it\noff in the usual auction process. </span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\nmachines should have been destroyed in the presence of a magistrate . &nbsp;Front man Karim Telgi and\nhis gang purchased these machines. It was all preplanned. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So Telgi and his gang\nhad real printing plates and real printing presses for printing real stamp\npapers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the stamp papers being produced were real, but just that the Indian\ngovernment was not printing them!&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was NOT counterfeit stamp paper ,but real\nones .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">OBC\nChaggan Bhijjbal &nbsp;was born in extreme poverty\nand was a vegetable vendor in Byculla Market , where his mother was selling\nfruits with a small shop. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharashtra CM,\nFadnavis and Narendra Modi knows very well how a pauper like &nbsp;Chaggan\nBhujjbal \u2018s family now owns </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">a business\nempire with stakes in mines, vine yards, power projects, infrastructure and\nconstruction companies.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">Assets worth Rs. 2,520\ncrore are clear evidence of disproportionate assets of Bhujbal's family,\" AAP\nleader Anjali damania </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">mentioned in her\ncomplaint before the Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB)a month ago ,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">which also has a list of properties allegedly\nowned by Bhujbal and his family members.</span></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ACB is also\ninvestigating the role of Chhagan Bhujbal in the Maharashtra Sadan Delhi\nredevelopment scam. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even though there\nwas no official request from the BJP, &nbsp;after the Maharashtra elections , the NCP gave\nit unconditional support from outside to form government. This was after a\ndeliberation called by NCP chief Sharad Pawar at his Breach Candy residence\nwhere Ajit Pawar, Sunil Tatkare, Supriya Sule, Praful Patel and Chhahan Bhujbal\nwere present.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During P-300 Brain Mapping tests KarimTelgi has\nclearly admitted that he had given payments to Bhujbal. &nbsp; In In the May 2014 the\nrecent Lok Sabha elections, Bhujbal was decimated . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The narco tests were\nperformed by the Forensic Science Laboratory (FSL), Madiwala, Bangalore, in\nDecember 2003 and the report was prepared by Assistant Director, Dr S Malini.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karim Telgi appointed more\nthan 350 MBA graduates as agents to sell his fake stamp paper . &nbsp; He could NOT have done this without adequate\nhelp from powerful politicians , police and govt employees. One Assistant\nPolice Investigator was found to have a net worth of over 100 crore rupees\n,though he was drawing a Indian police salary of only 8700 rupees. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Telgi formed a film\nproducing company \u201cSona films \u201c named after his daughter and even produced &nbsp;a Moon Moon Sen starrer film Bechainee. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; <span style=\"color: blue;\">A Bollywood producers brother was my Chief Officer , and he has told me the names of 3 huge female stars who were forced to \"please \" some IT officers by their mafia producers &nbsp;.</span></b></span><span style=\"color: blue; How\nis it possible for a such a scam to continue merrily for more than a decade, with&nbsp; officials of India Security Press (which\nprints stamp papers) in cahoots ? &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Official scam estimate\nis now fixed at 172 crores , but the actual scam is worth over 30,000 crores . </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These fake stamp papers penetrated in more\nthan 12 states through a widespread network of vendors who sold the\ncounterfeits without any fear and earned hefty commissions.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pchO9rPdSP8/VILb-J7duuI/AAAAAAAAzkw/GCXtQs-JdBc/s1600/land_hh100.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pchO9rPdSP8/VILb-J7duuI/AAAAAAAAzkw/GCXtQs-JdBc/s1600/land_hh100.jpg\" width=\"227\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudrank (The Stamp) is\na film based on the stamp scandal. &nbsp;It\nwas finished in 2008, but Telgi filed legal challenges to prevent its release.\nTelgi alleged that the details covered in the film would damage his legal\nappeals. As of today, the film has not yet been released. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SM Krishna ( a darling\nof the waitress ) appointed SIT to investigate the case . &nbsp;Why was such a sensitive economic crime with\ninter-state ramifications and such enormous nature only handed over to SIT and\nnot entrusted to specialized agencies like CBI for investigation ? &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TiWwU7MTHdA/VIQeMT9U5LI/AAAAAAAAzng/Gj7SR26rZBI/s1600/ngo%2Bffrartoon2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TiWwU7MTHdA/VIQeMT9U5LI/AAAAAAAAzng/Gj7SR26rZBI/s1600/ngo%2Bffrartoon2.jpg\" width=\"284\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>We want Narendra Modi and Maharashtra CM\nFadnavis to exhume this Telgi scam and ensure the big cats are punished and NOT\nthe foot soldier pawns , the machinery operators, the vendors, the sweepers and\nthe toilet cleaners .&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whoever wriggled out must be re-examined and punished in\nfound guilty&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mumbai police\ncommissioner Ranjit Singh Sharma was arrested and then exonerated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tldEEHIRSbw/VILbfddY2vI/AAAAAAAAzko/adnAKp4JFtY/s1600/m_id_8ffr7666_abdul_karim_telgi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tldEEHIRSbw/VILbfddY2vI/AAAAAAAAzko/adnAKp4JFtY/s1600/m_id_8ffr7666_abdul_karim_telgi.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Investigation and timeline:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In August 2000 the\nBangalore police arrested 2 possessing fake stamp and stamp paper. Abdul Karim\nTelgi\u2019s name surfaced in the investigation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 2001, the\nBangalore city police arrested Telgi from Ajmer and sent him to &nbsp;Bangalore central prison. &nbsp; Unfazed Telgi\ncontinued to run his \u2018business\u2019 from the jail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In January 2002: SM\nKrishna Govt. of Karnataka constitutes STAMPIT, the special investigation team\nto probe the stamp paper scam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2003 to 2004: Police\ncomes into action all over making series of arrests in the case as directed by\nSIT. Telgi and several others who were involved in the case as Telgi\u2019s aide or\notherwise were arrested. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 2003,\nMaharashtra govt. decided to hand over the case to CBI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In August 2004, CBI\narrested Telgi in another case pertaining to seizure of fake stamps \u2013 the police\nfound fake adhesive stamps worth Rs 72 lakh from a dump in Nashik.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April 2006 it is\ndetermined that the actual magnitude of the stamp paper scam amounts to Rs. 172\ncrores and not Rs. 30,000 crores as initially speculated</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 2007 </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Telgi got a 13 years rigorous imprisonment\nwith a fine of crores of rupees in one of the major cases under the scam filed\nby Pune Police. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">While, 42 other accused\nget rigorous imprisonment for upto 6 years and a fine.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 2011 the\nspecial Maharashtra Control of Organized Crime Act court in Pune convicted 5\npeople including the kingpin of the scam Telgi and sentenced them to 10 more\nyears of rigorous imprisonment in one of the stamp paper scam cases filed\nagainst him in Mumbai in 2005.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In March 2012, Abdul\nKarim Telgi was &nbsp;sentenced to life\nimprisonment without remission in three separate cases registered against him\nin Mumbai. &nbsp;This means that the sentence\nwill extend till his death. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just like how Nithari\nserial killer servant Surinder Koli was made the scape goat for the kidney body\norgan trade in Noida-.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karim </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Telgi paid a price where as the real big cat benefactors\ngot the money and are roaming free enjoying life. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All severed heads had\nno eyes - the bodies had &nbsp;kidneys and\nlivers missing. &nbsp;Children had been\nmissing even before Koli came as a servant in that house in Nodia . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Allahabad High\nCourt has extended the stay on the hanging of the Nithari serial killer\nSurinder Koli till December 22 2014. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nIndia the rich and powerful go scot free. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Politicians in ruling party and opposition\nscratch each others backs QUID PRO QUO .</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-23HBteejhO4/VIQcSRKL7OI/AAAAAAAAznM/HalgXVuQp10/s1600/602659.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Only IDIOTS will\nsubscribe to the nonsense theory of Koli eating livers and kidneys and eyes. &nbsp;&nbsp;But then we are a nation who have employed\nidiots in our investigative agencies , right?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-e48uSPGByts/VILvcEe6o8I/AAAAAAAAzlI/88aVD2ehs9o/s1600/igrmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-e48uSPGByts/VILvcEe6o8I/AAAAAAAAzlI/88aVD2ehs9o/s1600/igrmages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nobody cares for the\nfact that the MWCD committee reported that the Chief Medical Superintendent,\nunder whose supervision the post-mortem was conducted \u201cafter assembling the\nbones/skulls found at the site,\u201d told the committee that \u201cit was intriguing to\nobserve the middle part (torso) was missing.\u201d According to him, \u201csuch missing\ntorsos give rise to a suspicion that wrongful use of bodies for organ sale,\netc. could be possible\u2026. (and) the surgical precision with which the bodies\nwere cut also pointed to this fact.\u201d</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8UvQL64WT5s/VILvzSNI--I/AAAAAAAAzlQ/wA8zaN5PvDE/s1600/childkillprotest_wffrideweb__470x321%2C0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"436\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8UvQL64WT5s/VILvzSNI--I/AAAAAAAAzlQ/wA8zaN5PvDE/s1600/childkillprotest_wffrideweb__470x321%2C0.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n\n\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While in jail Telgi was\ninjected with HIV virus . &nbsp;Telgi alleged\nthat he was injected with AIDS virus some three years ago by the team of\nSTAMPIT (Karnataka Police's special team which was probing the fake stamp paper\ncase) after it took over his custody from the Bangalore central jail where he\nwas lodged.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The biggest loser in\nthe entire scenario was the nation who lost crores of rupees of revenue from\nstamp duty on account of sale of fake stamp papers. &nbsp;&nbsp;Besides, it affected the legal and financial\ntransactions (in sectors like banking, insurance etc.) made during the scam\nperiod.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Five months ago Karim\nTelgi was granted permission by the Karnataka High Court to attend the marriage\nof his daughter which was held in Bangalore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Telgi scam is NOT\nisolated. Dozens of such scams are going on in India with patronage from\npowerful forces .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-i5MGPJqAhVg/VIQc013casI/AAAAAAAAznU/aXm-CphZvGY/s1600/2003114421002204702.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"262\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-i5MGPJqAhVg/VIQc013casI/AAAAAAAAznU/aXm-CphZvGY/s1600/2003114421002204702.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>&nbsp;EPILOGUE:-</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-v2jVij8d9bo/VILa6ErfNHI/AAAAAAAAzkI/DuyXoakQNPk/s1600/article-2432633-1843eeD10200000578-636_634x422.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-v2jVij8d9bo/VILa6ErfNHI/AAAAAAAAzkI/DuyXoakQNPk/s1600/article-2432633-1843eeD10200000578-636_634x422.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Patna in Sept 2014,\na major haul of fake stamp papers reminiscent of the scam by Abdul Karim Telgi\na decade ago.&nbsp; &nbsp;Bihar Police seized counterfeit judicial\npapers with a face value of Rs 107 crore and arrested 16 persons from various\nplaces in Patna district.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mastermind is Ranjit Kumar, who hails from\nGorakhpur in Uttar Pradesh.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arrested\ngang members revealed that they had already circulated fake stamp papers worth\nlakhs of rupees in Bihar, Uttar Pradesh, Odisha and West Bengal through\nvendors. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fake stamp papers in\ndenominations of Rs 10, Rs 100, Rs 200, Rs 500, Rs 750 and Rs 20,000 were meant\nfor use in agreement for land registration, apartment registration, affidavit\nand issuance of power of attorney.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police during its operation in the two\nhouses also seized equipment like computer, printer, dye, cutting machine,\nprinting block ink used for printing the security thread on non-judicial stamp\npapers, Kisan Credit Cards, National Savings Certificates, bank cheques, postal\nstamps and court tickets</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I6LMQnM04ns/VILbQLPLqCI/AAAAAAAAzkg/bBGZnwFTtXc/s1600/PATNA%2BjjkjME%2BSSP%2BKA%2B%2BZALI%2B%2BDOLLER%2BPAKRE%2BJANE%2BPER%2BSSP%2BKA%2BPRESS%2BCONFRENCE.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I6LMQnM04ns/VILbQLPLqCI/AAAAAAAAzkg/bBGZnwFTtXc/s1600/PATNA%2BjjkjME%2BSSP%2BKA%2B%2BZALI%2B%2BDOLLER%2BPAKRE%2BJANE%2BPER%2BSSP%2BKA%2BPRESS%2BCONFRENCE.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The operation yielded a haul of scanner machines, ink\nused for printing prototype of stamps and sheets. &nbsp;&nbsp;Large\nquantity of fake stamp papers, postal tickets and printed envelope of State\nBank of India, besides printing machines, computers, printers, scanners and\nother equipment used for printing fake stamp papers were recovered from yet\nanother house in Bahadur police station area.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">None was, however, arrested in\nthis instance. &nbsp;A police officer who was\npart of the team said it was not easy to spot the difference between fake and\ngenuine stamp papers of different denominations. The forgers were &nbsp;printing foreign currencies including US\ndollars and Euros.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHEN YOU BUY A STAMP PAPER NEXT TIME, CHANCES ARE THAT IT IS A COUNTERFEIT ONE .</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-J5vzXh80Ua8/VILayU95cYI/AAAAAAAAzkA/SI7Hy-CCsuo/s1600/Pgjki001.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-J5vzXh80Ua8/VILayU95cYI/AAAAAAAAzkA/SI7Hy-CCsuo/s1600/Pgjki001.png\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Modi govt must\ncancel all the high denomination stamp papers and announce e-payment. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One\nsuch man developed kidney problems within a week. &nbsp;The waitress had to make him VC of an\nuniversity so that his dialysis bills come free.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such people will never\npiss on the statue of a man on a cross or some holy books of single messiah\nreligions .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AGHORIS , THE CORPSE\nEATERS OF INDIA VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>DEVADASI SYSTEM , THE\nIMMORAL &nbsp;LIE &nbsp;BY THE WHITE INVADER &nbsp;VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ASHWAMEDHA YAGAM , A\nBLOODLESS SACRIFICE &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">KODUNGALLUR BHARANI\nFESTIVAL VADAKAYIL</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>KAMASUTRA &nbsp;IMMORAL SEXUAL PERVERSION INJECTED &nbsp;VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When you enter the Indian Parliament Building\nin New Delhi , you come face to face with a 7000 year old Sanskrit verse:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ayam\nNijah Paroveti Ganana Laghu Chetasaam<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Udaara\nCharitaanaam tu Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSmall and narrow-minded\npeople look at the reality in terms of \u2018this is yours and this is mine\u2019; for\nthose of higher consciousness the whole world is a family\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India before the\nMuslim and Christian invaders came, almost the entire country was vegetarian,\nbut for the people on the coastline who ate fish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today 42% of Indians\nare vegetarians-- the rest being Muslims , Christians, Sikhs etc.&nbsp; &nbsp;This\nis a large number of people as India has 1200 million people. &nbsp;&nbsp;This vegetarianism and Ahimsa ( non-violence\n) is the reason why Hindu India never attacked any country in its history.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vegetarian benefits?--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They are happier people<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The live longer<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They sleep better.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They have clearer\nconscience.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Lesser crime.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Their health while\nalive is better-- lesser diseases<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They can think clearer\n(lesser toxins/ fibre in food )<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They look better (\nlesser obesity )<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Lesser BO and MO<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Women in menopause\nsuffer less</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some ignoramuses say,\nthey vegetarians are NOT as strong as the meat eaters-- OK--which one of you\nwants to fight with an elephant , and prove yourself?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism is a spiritual\ncode based on dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma broadly means\nrighteousness. &nbsp;Hindusim has core values\nlike integrity, ethics, compassion , fairness, transparency, respect ,\ntolerance for culture, sense of responsibility, spirit of inclusion etc . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We temper all technical\njudgments by the need to support and maintain human values. Human acts without\nconscience which creates conflict is called Adharma.&nbsp; Dharma governed by human conscience is 'the\npath of righteousness', the way of 'correct', 'appropriate', 'decent', or\n'proper' behaviour.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is the moral law\ncombined with spiritual discipline that guides one's life. Consumption of food,\nsleep, fear, and enjoyment of sex are common to man and animal.&nbsp; But, 'Dharma' is a special attribute of the\nconscious man . Bereft of 'Dharma', man is equal to anima1.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Few Yamas and\nNiyamas&nbsp; - Moral and Ethical Ideals of\nHindus<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Ahims\u00e3 (non-injury)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Don't harm others by word, deed or\nthought.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Mit\u00e3h\u00e3ra&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nRefrain from overeating and consuming meat.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Shaucha (purity)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Observe purity of the body, mind and\nintellect.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Hr\u00ee (remorse)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Be modest and show remorse for\nmisconduct.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Santosha (contentment)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Don't be a slave to the senses. Seek joy\nand serenity in the Self.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the white\nChristian man first stepped into India in 1498, &nbsp;India was the world\u2019s richest country. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India held 40% of the\nworld's GDP.&nbsp; India and China together\nheld 58% of the world's GDP in 1498.&nbsp;\nThese are conservative estimates by the white man himself , like how\nAlexander defeated Porus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the British\nfinally left in 1947, India was converted to one of the poorest countries on\nthe planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In such a short time\nthey built roads, railway, harbors , airports and bridges to rob India\nblind.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After that these\nimmoral beggars dressed up as kings and had the temerity to ridicule us as\nbeggars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Om\nsarve bhavantu sukhinah, sarve santu nir\u00e3-maya-ah;<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sarve\nbhadrani pashyantu m\u00e3-kaschit dukha-bhak bhavet.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om,\nsh\u00e3ntih, sh\u00e3ntih, sh\u00e3ntih.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Oh Lord, may all\n[entire mankind] be happy; may all be healthy; may all experience prosperity;\nmay none (in the world) suffer. May peace, peace, peace be unto us and all the\nbeings of the world.\" <b>Brihad\u00e3ranyaka\nUpanishad 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Referring to the above\nprayer, Arthur Schopenhauer says, \"I know of no more beautiful prayer than\nthat of the Hindus...'May all that have life be delivered from suffering!'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu wrote,\n\"Non-violence, truth, non-coveting, purity of body and mind, control of\nsenses are the essence of dharma\". Therefore dharmic laws govern not only\nthe individual but all in society.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu further writes,\n\"Nonviolence, truth, non-coveting, purity of body and mind, control of\nsenses are the essence of Dharma\".&nbsp;\nDharma thus is a code of conduct that is intended to secure both worldly\njoys and supreme happiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu calls upon man to\nuse his conscience If man listens to his conscience he will not commit the sin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manusmriti says that\nahimsa is the foremost among the dharmas that are common to all. It is included\nin the yoga of mind control. Ahimsa means much more than non-injury or\nnn-violence ; it implies not doing harm to others even by thought or word.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From ahimsa Hinduism\nimparted to the world the practice of vegetarianism:&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7000 year old Yajurveda\ndictates -\"Do not injure the beings living on the earth, in the air and in\nthe water.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\nrespects the planet along with its flora and fauna. It is the only religion\nwhich advocates vegetarianism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu wrote that\npolluting the environment was a punishable offence. In Manu\u2019s laws a person\ncould be ex-communicated from society for mindless felling of tress or killing\nof animals, the way the English speaking white man shot the buffalo and\nexterminated the Indian American , or how the Australian Aborigine race was\nexterminated..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole idea of\nVaastu was to construct something without disturbing the flow of nature and\ninterrupting natural flow of energy. It is about peaceful co-existence and\ncomfort. Vaastu is about&nbsp; living&nbsp; in harmony with nature ( includes flora and\nfauna ) ,&nbsp; grateful for her natural\nbounties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It tells us not dominate and harass other\nliving beings, have inherent grace and know your \u201cduties\u201d.. That human beings\nare just but a link in this symbiotic chain of life and consciousness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ahimsa, \u201cnon-injury\u201d or\nthe absence of the desire to harm, is regarded by Indian thinkers as one of the\nkeystones of our ethics. &nbsp;Jews who have\nbeen kicked on their heads all over the world, all over time,&nbsp; have never been persecuted in India / Kerala\nover the millenniums.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hebrew religion and\nHinduism co-existed, only because Hindus are tolerant . They absorbed the&nbsp; inherent greed and clannishness of a\nquintessential Jew , without retaliation or retribution.
