THERE WAS NO SPILLING OF BLOOD..<br /><br />IN EVERY HINDU YAGAM/ YAGNA THE ONLY SACRIFICE IS DESI GHEE AND COCONUT WATER PLASMA..<br /><br />IN THE IRUMUDI KETTU OF A SABARIMALA PILGRIM THERE ARE TWO COCONUTS--ONE COCONUT WHOSE WATER IS REMOVED AND FILLED WITH DESI HUMPED COW GHEE , AND THE OTHER IS A FULL COCONUT WITH WATER INSIDE..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WIKIPEDIA DID BLASPHEMY THAT QUEEN OF AYODHYA KAUSHALYA , LAY BESIDE THE KILLED WHITE HORSE AND USED&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE SEVERED PEN!S OF THE DEAD HORSE AS A D!LDO,</span></b><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;THE WAY SWARA TRRR BHASKAR ( OR IS IT PRRRR ? ) USED IT.</span></span></div>\n<br />HINDUS ARE THE WORST ENEMIES OF HINDUS .. THERE ARE TOO MANY TRAITORS WHO WILL SELL THIER OWN MOTHERS TO THE WH0REHOUSE FOR HALF A PIECE OF SILVER..<br /><br />NO BLOOD IS ALLOWED IN ANY HINDU TEMPLE.. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE EVIL PHARMA TRIED\nTO PUT THE STERILIZATION DEATHS ON THE SURGEON RK GUPTA WHO HAS DONE MORE THAN\nONE LAKH SUCH SURGERIES AT SAME TIME INTERVAL &nbsp;OF ABOUT &nbsp;4.5 MINUTES &nbsp;. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DID NOT THE MEN DIE\n?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">See Generic drugs can\nbe pure-&nbsp; but combinations have to be\nTESTED .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s possible that the\ndrugs were pure, they were just given in a combination that is lethal to some\npeople with certain genetic predispositions.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Metabolism of drugs depend on personal\nmethylenetetrahydrofolate reductase ( MTHFR )&nbsp;\nmutations, and other genetic factors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the women who died\nwere given three drugs, diazepam (a benzodiazepine), ciprofloxacin (a\nfluoroquinolone) and ibuprofen (a NSAID).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These drugs should\nNEVER be given together because of the effects they have on the GABA-A\nreceptors in the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The UNFORTUNATE Indian\nwomen were given this combination of drugs in exactly the order required to\nhave tragic consequences.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The diazepam was given to them during the\nsurgery, to sedate them.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As they came off of the\ndiazepam, their GABA-A receptors likely became improperly stimulated. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Withdrawal from\nbenzodiazepines leaves the brain in a state of GABA-underactivity, resulting in\nhyperexcitability of the nervous system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While their brains were\nin this vulnerable state, they were given ciprofloxacin, a fluoroquinolone, and\nibuprofen, a NSAID.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fluoroquinolones\ninhibit benzodiazepine receptor binding &nbsp;and fluoroquinolone toxicity resembles protracted\nbenzodiazepine withdrawal in many of its symptoms -depression, anxiety,\npsychosis, paranoia, severe insomnia, paraesthesia, tinnitus, hypersensitivity\nto light and sound, tremors and seizures.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When ibuprofen, a\nNSAID, is added to the mix, it makes the fluoroquinolones even more toxic.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The presence of an\nNSAID or NSAID metabolite can significantly augment this effect (of\nfluoroquinolones) and result in an even greater inhibition of GABA-A receptor\nactivity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drugs short-circuit the\nbrain, and the brain controls everything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NARENDRA MODI MUST\nENSURE ONLY DOCTOR WITH MERIT JOIN INDIAN HOSPITALS \u2013 &nbsp;NOT 85 LAKH DONATION PARTY --&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--AND CHRISTIAN &nbsp;HOSPITAL SPONSORED STUDENTS WHO HAVE CONVERTED\nFROM HINDUISM TO CHRISTIANITY TO JOIN A PRIVATE MEDICAL COLLEGE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 18 July 2013, i.e.\nthe day of his retirement, a bench headed by Justice Altamas Kabir has quashed National\nEligibility cum Entrance Test ( NEET ) for Medical College entrance, for\nadmission to MBBS, BDS and post-graduate courses in medical and dental\ncolleges.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advocate Prashant\nBhushan alleged in an interview that the National Eligibility cum Entrance\nTest&nbsp; -NEET- judgement was leaked from\nthe chambers of ex-Chief Justice of India (CJI) Altamas Kabir to private\nmedical colleges.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Altamas Kabir that the\nNEET test had the effect of depriving the States, state-run universities and\nall medical colleges and institutions, including those enjoying the\nconstitutional protection, of their right to admit students to MBBS, BDS and\npostgraduate courses as per their own procedures, beliefs and\ndispensations.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So we Indians must\ncontinue going to doctors who got their MBBS by paying 85 lakh donation (\nmanagement quota is alleged to be easy if you convert to Christianity ) rather\nthan merit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The decision of SC to\ndiscontinue NEET left the students disappointed because the single window\nadmission system of NEET offered transparency, exempted medical students from\ntaking various entrance tests and exempted them from paying donation or\ncapitation fees.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back-<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of both the\neffects of fluoroquinolones with NSAIDs on GABA-A receptors, and also because\nof poisonous metabolites formed when multiple carboxylic acid containing drugs\nare taken together (more information on both can be found HERE), they should\nNEVER be administered together.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is especially important that these dangerous\ndrugs not be given to people who have recently been given a benzodiazepine. &nbsp;Malfunctioning GABA receptors can damage, and\nshut down, many bodily systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
